SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_00_001_CUT_000_000.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_00_001_CUT_000_000.text:
Howdy, pard.
So what's the deal here?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_00_001_CUT_000_010.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_00_001_CUT_000_010.text:
Ah, an alien is in our midst! It's been a
great many cycles since an outsider last
visited us, so I suppose I could spare the
time to explain our 'deal,' as you put it.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_00_001_CUT_000_020.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_00_001_CUT_000_020.text:
This is the laboratory of Green Division,
where we research various forms of life.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_00_001_CUT_000_030.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_00_001_CUT_000_030.text:
Biology, huh? Like turnin' slugs 
into giant monster slugs?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_00_001_CUT_000_040.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_00_001_CUT_000_040.text:
No. The research of fiends and monsters
falls under the purview of Red Division.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_00_001_CUT_000_050.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_00_001_CUT_000_050.text:
We in Green Division collect unusual life-forms
from various worlds, as well as flora and fauna
with medicinal properties. We also pursue
research into the fundaments of life itself.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_00_001_CUT_000_060.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_00_001_CUT_000_060.text:
In fact, all the food, medical supplies,
and biologically derived fuels consumed
within the base are created here.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_00_001_CUT_000_070.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_00_001_CUT_000_070.text:
Reckon that makes sense; just clankin'
beakers around all day ain't gonna
keep anyone's belly full.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_00_001_CUT_000_080.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_00_001_CUT_000_080.text:
Yes, although research remains our division's
primary mission—which is why we have little
time to waste engaging with aliens.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_00_001_CUT_000_090.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_00_001_CUT_000_090.text:
Currently, I am only speaking with you because
I have an idle moment while I await the receipt
of some quantum cat specimens. Speaking of
which, why haven't they arrived yet?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_00_001_CUT_000_100.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_00_001_CUT_000_100.text: Ain't never heard of that breed before.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_00_001_CUT_000_110.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_00_001_CUT_000_110.text:
Not to imply that I don't trust you, alien,
but we have valuable research samples
under our care, so I would ask you not to
go traipsing about the area.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_00_001_CUT_000_120.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_00_001_CUT_000_120.text:
Alternatively, if you would consent to our
examining you, injecting you with chemicals,
and then dissecting you, I'm certain there's
much of interest we could learn.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_00_001_CUT_000_130.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_00_001_CUT_000_130.text:
Save the jokes for stand-up night,
darlin'. I'm outta here.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_020.text:
Yes. I, um... Well, I actually wanted
to ask you a favor? Kind of?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_030.text:
Oh, I'm one of the researchers
from Green Division, by the way.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_040.text:
If this favor involves dissectin' me,
you can take a long walk off a tall cliff.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_050.text:
What? Oh no! Nothing like that!
The favor actually involves catching
some quantum cats that ran away
from me down on the lower level.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_060.text:
Them quantum cats really are the talk
of the base! So you want me to go
round 'em up for you or what?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_070.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_070.text:
Exactly! Those naughty cats ran away just as
I was preparing them for an experiment.
And if my division overseer hears of this...
Oh, I don't even want to think about it!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_080.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_080.text:
Yeah, she didn't exactly strike me
as the forgivin' type.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_090.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_090.text: I can't even imagine what she might do if she found out I lost her cats!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_091.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_091.text:
Last time I screwed up, she made me participate in
an experiment involving an elixir that was supposed
to make you smart, but I'm so dumb that not even
that could—wait, that doesn't matter right now.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_100.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_100.text:
So what do these quantum cats look like,
anyhow? Just normal tabbies, or do they
got nine tails and three heads each?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_110.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_110.text:
There are two escaped cats: one named
Schrö, and the other named Dinger. But there is also only one escaped cat.
They are multiple, yet singular.
Deathless, yet not.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_120.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_120.text:
Quantum cats possess a mimetic ability
that causes other life-forms around them
to assume their appearance. As such, we have reports that the cat—
or cats—are hiding among fiends who now
ALSO appear to be quantum cats.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_130.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_130.text:
I asked a couple other lab workers to help
me capture the cats—er, or cat—but they all
ended up being attacked by monsters.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_140.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_140.text:
Okay, so these things are dangerous,
and they ain't gonna be easy to catch.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_150.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_150.text:
According to our research, quantum cats
are influenced by magnetic fields.
They cause real cats to face to the right,
and illusory cats to face to the left.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_160.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_160.text:
So if I can get a look at 'em,
I should be able to tell whether
they're real or not.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_170.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_170.text:
Yes, well, now that I've explained all of that,
I'm coming with you. You wouldn't be able to
use the lift without me, is the thing.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_171.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_171.text:
Oh, and my name's Qu Magis,
but you can call me Mags.

SUB_W10_GIMK_BOFO_CAT_01_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_GIMK_BOFO_CAT_01_000_CUT_000_000.text:
So is that there one'a
your quantum kitties?

SUB_W10_GIMK_BOFO_CAT_01_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_GIMK_BOFO_CAT_01_000_CUT_000_010.text:
Did you verify which direction
it was facing?

SUB_W10_GIMK_BOFO_CAT_01_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_GIMK_BOFO_CAT_01_000_CUT_000_020.text:
Right! Or wait, maybe left?
Definitely one'a the two.

SUB_W10_GIMK_BOFO_CAT_01_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_GIMK_BOFO_CAT_01_000_CUT_000_030.text: Better skip this one for now.

SUB_W10_GIMK_BOFO_CAT_01_002_CUT_000_000.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_GIMK_BOFO_CAT_01_002_CUT_000_000.text:
So what do I win, darlin'?
This a quantum cat or not?

SUB_W10_GIMK_BOFO_CAT_01_002_CUT_000_010.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_GIMK_BOFO_CAT_01_002_CUT_000_010.text:
It says 'Dinger' on its collar,
so it must be. Oh, what a relief
that we caught the right cat!

SUB_W10_GIMK_BOFO_CAT_01_002_CUT_000_020.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_GIMK_BOFO_CAT_01_002_CUT_000_020.text:
Didn't even try to scratch me, neither!
Real nice feller, this one.

SUB_W10_GIMK_BOFO_CAT_01_002_CUT_000_030.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_GIMK_BOFO_CAT_01_002_CUT_000_030.text: Ah, but the quantum cat you see isn't real. It's the cat you don't perceive that is the actual cat—one living on the boundary between dimensions.

SUB_W10_GIMK_BOFO_CAT_01_002_CUT_000_040.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_GIMK_BOFO_CAT_01_002_CUT_000_040.text:
So it's the cat I don't see that's real?
But how's that work? Dinger seems plenty
real to me—heck, I just booped his nose!

SUB_W10_GIMK_BOFO_CAT_01_002_CUT_000_050.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_GIMK_BOFO_CAT_01_002_CUT_000_050.text:
It's the collar. It's made of orichalcum,
which for some reason makes it possible
to interact with quantum cats.

SUB_W10_GIMK_BOFO_CAT_01_002_CUT_000_060.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_GIMK_BOFO_CAT_01_002_CUT_000_060.text:
Just gonna nod and pretend I got that.
So you studyin' these cats then?

SUB_W10_GIMK_BOFO_CAT_01_002_CUT_000_070.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_GIMK_BOFO_CAT_01_002_CUT_000_070.text:
Oh yes! We have much to learn from them.
Why, they could easily lead to a new era
of massive technological discoveries!

SUB_W10_GIMK_BOFO_CAT_01_002_CUT_000_090.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_GIMK_BOFO_CAT_01_002_CUT_000_090.text:
Exactly! Er, why else did you think
we were researching life-forms?

SUB_W10_GIMK_BOFO_CAT_01_002_CUT_000_100.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_GIMK_BOFO_CAT_01_002_CUT_000_100.text:
Probably some mad-scientist nonsense
like tryin' to live forever?

SUB_W10_GIMK_BOFO_CAT_01_002_CUT_000_110.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_GIMK_BOFO_CAT_01_002_CUT_000_110.text:
Oooh, that's a great guess!
Yeah, I've kind of got the same hunch
that might be the end goal in all this.

SUB_W10_GIMK_BOFO_CAT_01_002_CUT_000_120.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_GIMK_BOFO_CAT_01_002_CUT_000_120.text:
Darlin', I got no earthly idea.
Also sorta weird you don't seem
to know what you're researchin'.

SUB_W10_GIMK_BOFO_CAT_01_002_CUT_000_130.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_GIMK_BOFO_CAT_01_002_CUT_000_130.text:
Honestly, though? I don't think being
immortal would be very much fun.

SUB_W10_GIMK_BOFO_CAT_01_002_CUT_000_140.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_GIMK_BOFO_CAT_01_002_CUT_000_140.text:
We should probably go catch
us that other one, huh?

SUB_W10_GIMK_BOFO_CAT_01_003_CUT_000_000.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_GIMK_BOFO_CAT_01_003_CUT_000_000.text:
So what's the verdict?
Quantum or not?

SUB_W10_GIMK_BOFO_CAT_01_003_CUT_000_010.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_GIMK_BOFO_CAT_01_003_CUT_000_010.text:
Let's see... The collar says 'Schrö'!
Oh, wow, what a relief.

SUB_W10_GIMK_BOFO_CAT_01_003_CUT_000_020.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_GIMK_BOFO_CAT_01_003_CUT_000_020.text:
Thing's a real cutie, just like Dinger.
In fact, it's identical to Dinger!

SUB_W10_GIMK_BOFO_CAT_01_003_CUT_000_030.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_GIMK_BOFO_CAT_01_003_CUT_000_030.text: Well, they are the same cat, after all. There's two of them, yet just one. Dead, yet living. Existing, yet not.

SUB_W10_GIMK_BOFO_CAT_01_003_CUT_000_040.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_GIMK_BOFO_CAT_01_003_CUT_000_040.text:
So what's Green Division researchin'
with these critters, anyhow?

SUB_W10_GIMK_BOFO_CAT_01_003_CUT_000_050.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_GIMK_BOFO_CAT_01_003_CUT_000_050.text:
The fact they exist as a single cat and yet
two cats means they exist in a quantum state—
and are therefore connected at a quantum-
mechanical level.

SUB_W10_GIMK_BOFO_CAT_01_003_CUT_000_060.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_GIMK_BOFO_CAT_01_003_CUT_000_060.text:
Sorry, hon, but I was sick the day
they taught quantum mechanics
back at the academy.

SUB_W10_GIMK_BOFO_CAT_01_003_CUT_000_070.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_GIMK_BOFO_CAT_01_003_CUT_000_070.text:
I think we're doing something like trying to
control their state with orichalcum—to find out
if it's structured in a way that we can extract
energy from them without it diminishing?

SUB_W10_GIMK_BOFO_CAT_01_003_CUT_000_080.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_GIMK_BOFO_CAT_01_003_CUT_000_080.text:
Sounds like you don't entirely
understand this stuff neither.

SUB_W10_GIMK_BOFO_CAT_01_003_CUT_000_090.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_GIMK_BOFO_CAT_01_003_CUT_000_090.text:
Ha ha! Oh, I don't have the faintest
idea about most of this.

SUB_W10_GIMK_BOFO_CAT_01_003_CUT_000_100.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_GIMK_BOFO_CAT_01_003_CUT_000_100.text:
Well, at least you got your cats back.
Er, or your cat. Whatever.

SUB_W10_GIMK_BOFO_CAT_01_003_CUT_000_110.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_GIMK_BOFO_CAT_01_003_CUT_000_110.text:
And the monsters are gone too,
looks like?

SUB_W10_GIMK_BOFO_CAT_01_003_CUT_000_120.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_GIMK_BOFO_CAT_01_003_CUT_000_120.text:
Indeed they are. This is because the
influence of the cats' quantum field
has dissipated.

SUB_W10_GIMK_BOFO_CAT_01_003_CUT_000_130.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_GIMK_BOFO_CAT_01_003_CUT_000_130.text:
All wrapped up in a neat little bow!
Ain't that a peach.

SUB_W10_GIMK_BOFO_CAT_01_003_CUT_000_140.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_GIMK_BOFO_CAT_01_003_CUT_000_140.text:
I'll go back to the lab and
drop off the cat... Er, or cats.

SUB_W10_GIMK_BOFO_CAT_01_003_CUT_000_150.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_GIMK_BOFO_CAT_01_003_CUT_000_150.text:
Just watch out for that nasty
boss'a yours, y'hear?

SUB_W10_GIMK_BOFO_CAT_01_003_CUT_000_160.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W10_GIMK_BOFO_CAT_01_003_CUT_000_160.text:
So all that and no triangle
to show for it.

SUB_W10_GIMK_BOFO_CAT_01_003_CUT_000_170.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_GIMK_BOFO_CAT_01_003_CUT_000_170.text:
Aw, heck! I completely forgot
to look for the darn thing!

SUB_W10_GIMK_BOFO_CAT_01_001_CUT_005_000.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_GIMK_BOFO_CAT_01_001_CUT_005_000.text:
You said these were mimetic monsters,
right? But they don't look like cats?

SUB_W10_GIMK_BOFO_CAT_01_001_CUT_005_010.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_GIMK_BOFO_CAT_01_001_CUT_005_010.text:
Yes, they seem to be projecting their
existence through space-time? That's why
it changes their left-right directionality.

SUB_W10_GIMK_BOFO_CAT_01_001_CUT_005_020.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_GIMK_BOFO_CAT_01_001_CUT_005_020.text:
We speak of the cats in the multiple,
but in truth, they're singular.

SUB_W10_GIMK_BOFO_CAT_01_001_CUT_005_030.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_GIMK_BOFO_CAT_01_001_CUT_005_030.text: And it's possible that anyone other than the two of us would actually perceive us as cats.

SUB_W10_GIMK_BOFO_CAT_01_001_CUT_006_010.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_GIMK_BOFO_CAT_01_001_CUT_006_010.text:
It sure was. Now let's get moving
and find those quantum cats!

SUB_W10_GIMK_BOFO_CAT_01_001_CUT_006_020.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_GIMK_BOFO_CAT_01_001_CUT_006_020.text:
Couldn't we just lure 'em to us
with catnip or somethin'?

SUB_W10_GIMK_BOFO_CAT_01_001_CUT_006_040.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_GIMK_BOFO_CAT_01_001_CUT_006_040.text:
Can't believe you're seriously
a professional biologist.

SUB_W10_GIMK_BOFO_CAT_01_001_CUT_007_010.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_GIMK_BOFO_CAT_01_001_CUT_007_010.text:
It sure was. Now let's get moving
and find those quantum cats!

SUB_W10_GIMK_BOFO_CAT_01_001_CUT_007_020.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_GIMK_BOFO_CAT_01_001_CUT_007_020.text:
Before your overseer finds
out about all this, I take it?

SUB_W10_GIMK_BOFO_CAT_01_001_CUT_007_030.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_GIMK_BOFO_CAT_01_001_CUT_007_030.text:
Oh, you have no idea.
She is terrifying.

SUB_W10_GIMK_BOFO_CAT_01_001_CUT_008_010.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_GIMK_BOFO_CAT_01_001_CUT_008_010.text:
The cats really did manage to project
their appearance onto the monsters...

SUB_W10_GIMK_BOFO_CAT_01_001_CUT_008_020.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_GIMK_BOFO_CAT_01_001_CUT_008_020.text: It makes me wonder if quantum cats are simply creatures onto which normal cats have projected their appearances.

SUB_W10_GIMK_BOFO_CAT_01_001_CUT_008_030.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_GIMK_BOFO_CAT_01_001_CUT_008_030.text: Heck, what if they were mice all along?

SUB_W10_GIMK_BOFO_CAT_01_001_CUT_008_040.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_GIMK_BOFO_CAT_01_001_CUT_008_040.text:
That does make for a very
interesting thought exercise!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_01_100_CUT_000_000.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_01_100_CUT_000_000.text:
You get them quantum cats wrangled
wherever they need to be?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_01_100_CUT_000_010.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_01_100_CUT_000_010.text:
I did, thanks to you. Now our biological
research can move forward without issue.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_01_100_CUT_000_030.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_01_100_CUT_000_030.text:
But, um, seeing as you were such a helpful
alien, do you think I could maybe ask you
for another favor? I mean, if I need it?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_01_100_CUT_000_040.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_01_100_CUT_000_040.text:
That's really gonna depend on
what the favor is, darlin'.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_04_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_04_000_CUT_000_000.text: A passcode? Where did you get that?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_04_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_04_000_CUT_000_010.text:
Picked it up off the ground.
Why, is it important?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_04_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_04_000_CUT_000_030.text:
That's a passcode for unlocking one of
the cryosleep pods on the lower floor—
and a rather old one, at that.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_04_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_04_000_CUT_000_040.text:
Pod 007, is it? Yes, it seems a patient in that
pod has been waiting for a medical treatment
to be developed since...cycle 31!? By atoms,
it must be one of the progenitors!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_04_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_04_000_CUT_000_060.text:
A member of the generation that established
Delta Base. Why, someone from that time would
likely know the answers to all the great
mysteries of this place!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_04_000_CUT_000_080.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_04_000_CUT_000_080.text:
May I take this code, alien? A medical treatment
for this patient's condition has long since been
developed, but I don't dare thaw a progenitor
without first informing the Council of Overseers.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_04_000_CUT_000_090.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_04_000_CUT_000_090.text:
Please, alien. Give me the code.
You've been quite helpful so far,
and it would sadden me if I had
to take it from you by force.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_04_000_CUT_000_100.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_04_000_CUT_000_100.text:
No reason for the rough stuff—
I reckon it's your property anyhow. Still, this whole progenitor cryosleep thing
has me intrigued, so can you at least point
me to it? Might have something to do with
our triangle, after all.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_04_000_CUT_000_110.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_04_000_CUT_000_110.text:
All right. We'll consider it a reward
for your prompt cooperation.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_04_010_CUT_000_010.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_04_010_CUT_000_010.text:
Reckon our triangle might be in there,
which is why I memorized the code!
So should I open 'er up?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_04_020_CUT_000_010.speaker: Man_Overworld_Battle
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_04_020_CUT_000_010.text:
Nnngh... Is this...a cryopod?
Ah, I see. I've finally awakened.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_04_020_CUT_000_020.speaker: Man_Overworld_Battle
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_04_020_CUT_000_020.text:
I'll not let you dastards have your way!
Not now, and not ever!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_04_020_CUT_000_040.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_04_020_CUT_000_040.text:
Huh. Sure didn't think this
would all go down like that.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_04_020_CUT_000_050.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_04_020_CUT_000_050.text: What in the...? Pod 007 is open!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_04_020_CUT_000_060.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_04_020_CUT_000_060.text: And it's empty! What's going on!?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_04_020_CUT_000_080.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_04_020_CUT_000_080.text:
Uh-oh. May have goofed that up
just a bit there.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_04_020_CUT_000_090.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_04_020_CUT_000_090.text:
You have a very lackadaisical
definition of 'goof,' Bonnie.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_04_021_CUT_000_000.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_04_021_CUT_000_000.text:
So what happened with that progenitor
cryosleep business? Did that Council
of Overseers ever make a decision?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_04_021_CUT_000_010.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_04_021_CUT_000_010.text:
Sadly, the progenitor escaped
the pod and is currently missing. I don't suppose YOU know
anything about this, alien?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_04_021_CUT_000_030.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_04_021_CUT_000_030.text:
A shame. For if we do not find the progenitor
soon, their ailment will progress to the point
where treatment is no longer possible.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_04_021_CUT_000_050.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_04_021_CUT_000_050.text:
Heck. This thing's gonna blow
up in my face hard, ain't it?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_04_030_CUT_000_010.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_04_030_CUT_000_010.text:
The cryosleep pod of a progenitor?
Boy, you've really poked the damn
hornet's nest this time.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_04_030_CUT_000_020.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_04_030_CUT_000_020.text:
This could threaten everything
that Delta Base has become.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_04_030_CUT_000_030.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_04_030_CUT_000_030.text:
And yet, the person inside that pod could be
the only living witness to Delta Base's history.
Their cultural and historical value is a thing
beyond all measure!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_04_030_CUT_000_040.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_04_030_CUT_000_040.text:
Which is why I propose that the
Council of Overseers leave them
frozen here indefinitely.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_04_030_CUT_000_060.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_04_030_CUT_000_060.text:
Then Administrative Division will
take the appropriate measures.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_04_030_CUT_000_070.speaker: Chief_Manager
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_04_030_CUT_000_070.text:
Understood. I will see to it that
their cryosleep is not interrupted.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_04_030_CUT_000_080.speaker: Chief_Manager
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_04_030_CUT_000_080.text:
I have also changed the passcode
as a security precaution.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_04_030_CUT_000_090.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_04_030_CUT_000_090.text:
Shucks! They changed the code.
Should've opened the dang thing
back when I had the chance.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_04_031_CUT_000_000.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_04_031_CUT_000_000.text:
Say, you're the feller who was
in the cryosleep pod, right?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_04_031_CUT_000_010.speaker: Man_Overworld_Battle
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_04_031_CUT_000_010.text:
And you are the one who awakened me.
You have my thanks, for at long last,
I can now resume my work.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_04_031_CUT_000_020.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_04_031_CUT_000_020.text:
Hold up, that's the Connectivity Gate!
Where you headed, exactly?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_04_031_CUT_000_030.speaker: Man_Overworld_Battle
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_04_031_CUT_000_030.text:
To the Conjoined Worlds,
where my task awaits me!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_04_031_CUT_000_040.speaker: Man_Overworld_Battle
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_04_031_CUT_000_040.text:
And I sense it is your task as well—
so take this, my comrade!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_04_031_CUT_000_060.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_04_031_CUT_000_060.text:
That's another triangle, isn't it?
It's resonating with the frame.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_04_031_CUT_000_070.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_04_031_CUT_000_070.text:
I don't get what just happened—
or why we're that feller's 'comrades'!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_00_005_CUT_000_000.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_00_005_CUT_000_000.text: So what do y'all research here?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_00_005_CUT_000_010.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_00_005_CUT_000_010.text:
Ah, an alien. Thankfully, we have a researcher
whose duties include interfacing with those
from outside the division, so let me just... Oh, bother. I don't see her anywhere. Tsk!
Well then, I guess it falls to me, the
overseer of the entire Green Division,
to assuage your idle curiosity... Joy.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_00_005_CUT_000_020.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_00_005_CUT_000_020.text:
Oh, I was just tryin' to be polite—
I ain't actually all that interested.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_00_005_CUT_000_030.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_00_005_CUT_000_030.text:
Just make sure you pay attention!
Now then, we in Green Division
conduct biological research.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_00_005_CUT_000_040.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_00_005_CUT_000_040.text:
Our field is a broad one, spanning everything
from the life-forms that live here on Delta Base
to the interdimensional beings that exist in
the space between worlds.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_00_005_CUT_000_050.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_00_005_CUT_000_050.text:
We cover everything from organic chemistry to
life sciences to particle physics, and demand
an incredibly wide breadth of knowledge—
certainly the largest in all of Delta Base.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_00_005_CUT_000_060.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_00_005_CUT_000_060.text:
Sounds like some pretty intense
fields of research you got there.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_00_005_CUT_000_070.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_00_005_CUT_000_070.text:
Just so, which is why I'm proud to say every
member of Green Division is an exceptional
researcher! ...Well, save for a small few.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_00_005_CUT_000_080.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_00_005_CUT_000_080.text:
Now then, alien. As we have valuable research
samples under our care, I would ask you not
to go traipsing about the area.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_00_005_CUT_000_090.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_00_005_CUT_000_090.text:
Alternatively, if you would consent to our
examining you, injecting you with chemicals,
and then dissecting you, I'm certain there's
much of interest we could learn.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_00_005_CUT_000_100.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_00_005_CUT_000_100.text:
Always leave 'em laughin', I guess.
Well, I'll be on my way.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_05_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_05_000_CUT_000_000.text: Oops! Oh dear, I'm so sorry!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_05_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_05_000_CUT_000_010.text: You okay? What's the big rush?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_05_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_05_000_CUT_000_040.text:
Oh, it's nothing. Or, well... Okay, here it is: on the lower level, we're
currently cultivating and researching these
otherworldly vegetables called monophids
that we use to make food and medicine.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_05_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_05_000_CUT_000_050.text:
I take it these otherworldly veggies
are different from the normal kind?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_05_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_05_000_CUT_000_060.text:
Oh, very much so. In fact, you have to
be REALLY careful with the type and
amount of fertilizer you give them.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_05_000_CUT_000_070.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_05_000_CUT_000_070.text:
But I sort of...didn't do that?
And now they've turned into monsters
that are propagating exponentially.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_05_000_CUT_000_080.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_05_000_CUT_000_080.text:
Considering their current rate of growth,
they'll soon overrun the entire lower level!
And if Green Division's overseer happens
to find out about this...

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_05_000_CUT_000_100.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_05_000_CUT_000_100.text:
Oh, I can't even imagine what she'll do!
Last time I messed up, she injected me with
an experimental mushroom extract that was
supposed to let you go days without sleep! And the time before that, she...
Well, you get the idea.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_05_000_CUT_000_110.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_05_000_CUT_000_110.text:
But say, you're an alien, right? Would you 
be willing to help me exterminate our now
rapidly expanding monophid population?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_05_000_CUT_000_120.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_05_000_CUT_000_120.text:
Otherworldly vegetables don't seem to have
much to do with our triangle, but I never
turn down a chance to punch a cucumber!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_05_000_CUT_000_130.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_05_000_CUT_000_130.text:
Thank you so much! Oh, and I should mention
that the monophids have developed an abnormal
property in which they scream when they perceive
danger. So, um, be careful of that.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_05_000_CUT_000_140.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_05_000_CUT_000_140.text:
Reckon that whole screamin' bit is the
'otherworldly' part you mentioned.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_05_000_CUT_000_150.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_05_000_CUT_000_150.text:
Yes, and it's all kinds of trouble! In fact,
according to past records, all the research 
teams that tried to deal with these kinds
of infestations suffered MASSIVE casualties.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_05_000_CUT_000_160.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_05_000_CUT_000_160.text:
Still, if we could emit something at the same
wavelength as the monophids' screams,
we might be able to cancel them out.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_05_000_CUT_000_170.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_05_000_CUT_000_170.text:
Fightin' sound waves with sound waves.
I like it.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_05_000_CUT_000_200.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_05_000_CUT_000_200.text:
I'm Bonnie. Good to meet you, Mags—
although it kinda feels like maybe we've
done this all before?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_05_010_CUT_000_000.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_05_010_CUT_000_000.text:
Darlin', you weren't kiddin'
about that scream.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_05_010_CUT_000_010.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_05_010_CUT_000_010.text:
I thought I was prepared for it,
but it still feels like my head
is splitting apart!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_05_010_CUT_000_020.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_05_010_CUT_000_020.text:
C'mon, monophid! If you're gonna
be a plant, act like one!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_05_011_CUT_000_000.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_05_011_CUT_000_000.text: So these are the monophids, eh?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_05_011_CUT_000_010.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_05_011_CUT_000_010.text:
Sure looks like they're screamin' their
fool heads off, but I can't hear a thing.
Guess that sound-cancelation plan
of yours worked like a charm.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_05_011_CUT_000_020.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_05_011_CUT_000_020.text: We should be able to gather them now.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_05_012_CUT_000_000.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_05_012_CUT_000_000.text:
That's one down. Hey, so what do
you do with these critters anyhow?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_05_012_CUT_000_010.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_05_012_CUT_000_010.text:
Screaming aside, monophids have a lot
of vitality—and their seeds are quite
rich in various nutrients.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_05_012_CUT_000_030.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_05_012_CUT_000_030.text:
Alas, this time it was my own dumb fault
for messing up the fertilizer. And the
reproductivity was probably a result of
all the selective breeding! Heh heh...heh?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_05_012_CUT_000_040.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_05_012_CUT_000_040.text:
But do you know why Green Division is
trying to uncover the secrets of life?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_05_012_CUT_000_080.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_05_012_CUT_000_080.text:
Even if they did find some way,
it'd probably require a weird surgery.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_05_012_CUT_000_090.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_05_012_CUT_000_090.text: By that psychotic overseer of yours?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_05_012_CUT_000_100.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_05_012_CUT_000_100.text:
Nooo, don't even joke about that!
Let's just hurry on, okay?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_05_020_CUT_000_000.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_05_020_CUT_000_000.text:
Another monophid wailin'
away to beat the band.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_05_020_CUT_000_010.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_05_020_CUT_000_010.text:
Even when I know it's coming,
it still disturbs me.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_05_020_CUT_000_020.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_05_020_CUT_000_020.text: Let's make quick work of it.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_05_022_CUT_000_010.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_05_022_CUT_000_010.text:
Hey, so don't let anyone know
I told you this, but...

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_05_022_CUT_000_020.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_05_022_CUT_000_020.text:
Hoo-eee! Nothin' I love more
than a juicy Delta Base rumor!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_05_022_CUT_000_030.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_05_022_CUT_000_030.text:
As far as I know, this is the first time
we've dealt with an outsider like you.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_05_022_CUT_000_040.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_05_022_CUT_000_040.text:
But on the lower level, there's apparently
someone who isn't a member of Green Division
or any other division!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_05_022_CUT_000_050.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_05_022_CUT_000_050.text:
Like a ghost or something, I guess.
And while I kind of want to see them,
I also kind of...don't?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_05_022_CUT_000_060.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_05_022_CUT_000_060.text:
So the hard-science focused
Green Division is afraid'a spooks?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_05_022_CUT_000_070.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_05_022_CUT_000_070.text:
Look, I just want to get that last
monophid before the ghost appears!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_05_022_CUT_000_080.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_05_022_CUT_000_080.text:
Are you seriously a scientist, hon?
Like, with a diploma from a school
in an actual building?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_05_030_CUT_000_000.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_05_030_CUT_000_000.text:
Hush with the screamin' already,
you dumb weed!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_05_030_CUT_000_010.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_05_030_CUT_000_010.text:
Actually, I think there's a part of
me that's starting to enjoy it.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_05_030_CUT_000_020.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_05_030_CUT_000_020.text:
Well, now that you mention it...
No sir, still hate it!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_05_032_CUT_000_020.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_05_032_CUT_000_020.text:
I didn't want to mention this earlier,
but a colleague of mine was actually
killed by one of the monophids.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_05_032_CUT_000_030.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_05_032_CUT_000_030.text: Might've appreciated hearin' that anecdote before I agreed to this.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_05_032_CUT_000_040.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_05_032_CUT_000_040.text:
Yeah, I didn't want to worry you while we were
hunting them down. Er, but now that I know you,
I bet you would have helped me even if you HAD
known, 'cause that's the kind of alien you are.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_05_032_CUT_000_050.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_05_032_CUT_000_050.text:
So you just openly manipulate folks
without so much as a hint'a shame, huh?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_05_040_CUT_000_010.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_05_040_CUT_000_010.text:
Well, I've got a lot of processing to do
on these guys, so I'm going to head back
to the upper level. Thanks again, alien.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_05_040_CUT_000_030.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_05_040_CUT_000_030.text:
Well, that certainly didn't do us any good
in terms of finding ourselves any triangles.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_05_050_CUT_000_000.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_05_050_CUT_000_000.text:
Thank you so much for helping me
with that whole monophid thing.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_05_050_CUT_000_010.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_05_050_CUT_000_010.text:
We only managed to recover one of them,
but that's still one more than none!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_05_050_CUT_000_020.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_05_050_CUT_000_020.text:
Um, so if anything else goes wrong,
can I ask for your help again?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_05_050_CUT_000_030.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_05_050_CUT_000_030.text:
Mmm. That's really gonna depend
on what the favor is, darlin'.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_05_050_CUT_000_040.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_05_050_CUT_000_040.text:
Thanks. Oh, and here's your reward
for helping me out.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_05_050_CUT_000_050.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_05_050_CUT_000_050.text: I'd never turn down free stuff!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_05_051_CUT_000_010.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_05_051_CUT_000_010.text:
We managed to recover two monophids.
That's wonderful!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_05_052_CUT_000_010.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_05_052_CUT_000_010.text:
We recovered all the monophids,
which should ensure that we're able
to go forward with our research.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_05_053_CUT_000_010.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_05_053_CUT_000_010.text:
Sadly, we had to eradicate all the monophids,
but I'll try to recover the specimens from
the carcasses; we grew them in good soil,
so even dead, they're full of nutrients.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_05_053_CUT_000_040.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_05_053_CUT_000_040.text:
I guess this turned out to be more about
exterminating monophids than recovering them.
But hey, you still get a reward for that.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_00_006_CUT_000_000.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_00_006_CUT_000_000.text:
What sorta sketchy business are
you up to in this here laboratory?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_00_006_CUT_000_010.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_00_006_CUT_000_010.text:
Oh, look. It's the alien. Also, what you consider to be 'sketchy' is,
in fact, reputable and cutting-edge research
spanning everything from the life sciences
to quantum mechanics.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_00_006_CUT_000_030.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_00_006_CUT_000_030.text:
The research of fiends, monsters,
and the like falls under the purview
of Red Division.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_00_006_CUT_000_040.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_00_006_CUT_000_040.text:
We in Green Division collect unusual life-forms
from various worlds, as well as flora and fauna
with medicinal properties. We also pursue
research into the fundaments of life itself.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_00_006_CUT_000_050.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_00_006_CUT_000_050.text:
But our research is not merely academic
in nature; we are equally devoted to
researching practical ways to improve
the quality of life here in Delta Base.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_00_006_CUT_000_060.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_00_006_CUT_000_060.text:
So y'all do more than just toast
marshmallows over burners all day?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_00_006_CUT_000_070.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_00_006_CUT_000_070.text:
Quite right. Green Division's researchers
are the best of the best, and they undertake
their work with meticulous care.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_00_006_CUT_000_080.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_00_006_CUT_000_080.text:
Now then, alien. As we have valuable research
samples under our care, I would ask you not
to go traipsing about the area.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_00_006_CUT_000_090.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_00_006_CUT_000_090.text:
In fact, I'm planning to begin an experiment
involving some new specimens shortly—
assuming they ever arrive, that is.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_00_006_CUT_000_100.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_00_006_CUT_000_100.text: I do hope there hasn't been another mistake. Ugh. I've half a mind to make a research specimen out of her one of these days...

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_00_006_CUT_000_110.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_00_006_CUT_000_110.text:
Alternatively, if you would consent to our
examining you, injecting you with chemicals,
and then dissecting you, I'm certain there's
much of interest we could learn.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_00_006_CUT_000_120.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_00_006_CUT_000_120.text:
Ha ha! That's a real knee-slapper, hon!
Well, I'll be seein' you.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_06_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_06_000_CUT_000_020.text:
Well, shoot! Your jar broke.
You all right?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_06_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_06_000_CUT_000_040.text:
Oh no! They escaped!
The tsuchinoko have escaped!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_06_000_CUT_000_080.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_06_000_CUT_000_080.text:
They're a very unique life-form,
fairly similar to snakes.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_06_000_CUT_000_090.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_06_000_CUT_000_090.text:
So your jar broke and them...what did you
call 'em? Teashoe nopos? The critters did
a little jailbreak? That don't sound good.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_06_000_CUT_000_100.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_06_000_CUT_000_100.text:
It's not. But the bigger problem is that
I'm a researcher for Green Division,
and if the overseer finds out I lost
our tsuchinoko specimens...

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_06_000_CUT_000_120.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_06_000_CUT_000_120.text:
Yes, exactly! Why, just the other day, 
she almost made me do a gene transplant
with an electric eel!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_06_000_CUT_000_130.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_06_000_CUT_000_130.text:
Er, but I guess that's beside the point.
Will you please help me recover them?
I mean, it WAS kind of your fault.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_06_000_CUT_000_140.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_06_000_CUT_000_140.text:
There were three specimens in the jar,
and they probably fled to the lower level.
Don't worry, I'll come with you.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_06_000_CUT_000_150.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_06_000_CUT_000_150.text:
Also, tsuchinoko snore when they sleep,
so that'll be the easiest time to try
and recapture them.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_06_000_CUT_000_160.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_06_000_CUT_000_160.text:
Here, let me activate that
lift over there for you.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_06_000_CUT_000_180.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_06_000_CUT_000_180.text:
My name's Bonnie. Tell me again
what these critters are called?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_06_100_CUT_000_030.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_06_100_CUT_000_030.text:
No way we're catching it
without a fight now.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_06_100_CUT_000_040.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_06_100_CUT_000_040.text: Should we still go for it?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_06_110_CUT_000_000.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_06_110_CUT_000_000.text:
That looks like one'a your critters.
Is the thing dead?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_06_110_CUT_000_010.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_06_110_CUT_000_010.text:
Yes, it's a tsuchinoko.
And no, it's just sleeping.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_06_110_CUT_000_020.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_06_110_CUT_000_020.text:
Aw, listen! It's even snorin' a little!
Wait, that's a mite strange, though.
Does the thing even have nostrils?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_06_110_CUT_000_030.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_06_110_CUT_000_030.text:
Enough with the questions!
This is our chance to catch it.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_000.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_000.text: One twerk yucko in the bag!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_010.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_010.text:
But we still have two to go.
I'm counting on you, alien.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_020.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_020.text:
So these...whatever they're called.
What do you use 'em for, anyhow?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_030.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_030.text:
Never mind that. Listen, do you find it
at all strange that you ALSO call these
creatures tsuchinoko?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_040.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_040.text:
I don't call 'em nothin', because I ain't
never heard of 'em before in my life.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_050.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_050.text:
Well, if you DID, that would be proof they
exist on multiple worlds—and yet, there are
no records of anyone ever releasing them
into another world!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_060.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_060.text:
I suppose they might jump into other dimensions
when they sense danger? I mean, that would also
explain why we haven't been able to get accurate
data on their native habitat or population.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_070.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_070.text: None of that makes a lick'a sense.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_090.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_090.text:
And if some sort of internal organ allows them to
jump between dimensions instead of magic or tech,
it would be possible for the same population to
exist on multiple worlds at once.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_100.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_100.text:
So you're sayin' these critters
of yours can warp around?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_110.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_110.text:
If the same individual tsuchinoko truly did
exist on multiple worlds at once, that would
make them living, breathing, interdimensional
teleportation devices!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_120.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_120.text:
And THAT means researching their species
could provide valuable clues for the
development of teleportation technology!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_130.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_130.text:
Still sounds like a load of fresh fertilizer
to me—but hey, good luck inventin' your
toochino-porter or whatever it is.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_140.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_140.text:
Aw, thank you so much
for saying that! You know, if we ever do get our
interdimensional teleportation up
and running, I'd love to visit your
world one day, alien.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_150.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_150.text:
Oh, my world ain't half as
interestin' as Delta Base.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_160.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_160.text:
Also, I know I'm always going on about
myself, but I really would like to hear
more about your world next time!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_170.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_170.text: Sounds like a real fine time.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_06_120_CUT_010_000.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_06_120_CUT_010_000.text:
What the heck was that—and how are we
ever supposed to catch these things!?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_06_200_CUT_000_000.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_06_200_CUT_000_000.text:
That's one'a your toothy nonos!
Am I right?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_06_200_CUT_000_010.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_06_200_CUT_000_010.text:
Yes. Well, not about the name.
But the identification is spot-on.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_06_200_CUT_000_030.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_06_200_CUT_000_030.text:
No way we're catching this
guy without a fight now.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_06_210_CUT_000_000.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_06_210_CUT_000_000.text: Got a truthy yolko in my sights!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_06_210_CUT_000_030.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_06_210_CUT_000_030.text: This is our chance to grab it.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_06_220_CUT_000_000.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_06_220_CUT_000_000.text:
Thought these things might
get cuter up close, but nope.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_06_220_CUT_000_040.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_06_220_CUT_000_040.text:
So, um, alien? Were you serious about
wanting to keep one of these?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_06_220_CUT_000_060.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_06_220_CUT_000_060.text:
Good, because these specimens are very precious
to us, so we can't let you take one with you.
Also, no photographs, flash or otherwise.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_06_220_CUT_000_070.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_06_220_CUT_000_070.text:
Can't even put m'hat on one
and grab a quick selfie?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_06_220_CUT_000_080.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_06_220_CUT_000_080.text:
Er, are you all right, alien?
You're mumbling. A lot.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_06_220_CUT_000_090.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_06_220_CUT_000_090.text: Never mind. Let's just get this done.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_06_300_CUT_000_030.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_06_300_CUT_000_030.text:
No way we're catching it
without a fight now.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_06_310_CUT_000_030.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_06_310_CUT_000_030.text:
Then this could be our
chance to catch it.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_06_320_CUT_000_000.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_06_320_CUT_000_000.text:
That's all of the little
critters, right?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_06_320_CUT_000_010.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_06_320_CUT_000_010.text:
Yep! We're all done. Now I'm gonna
run on up and get these processed,
so I'll see you later.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_06_320_CUT_000_020.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_06_320_CUT_000_020.text: Hoo-ee! That was a whole rodeo.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_06_320_CUT_000_030.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_06_320_CUT_000_030.text:
And not so much as a triangle
for our troubles.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_06_400_CUT_000_000.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_06_400_CUT_000_000.text:
Thanks again for your help
with the tsuchinoko.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_06_400_CUT_000_010.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_06_400_CUT_000_010.text:
Sure. Maybe one of these days I'll figure
out why those awful critters are so special.
How are they doin' anyhow?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_06_500_CUT_000_000.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_06_500_CUT_000_000.text:
We were able to capture all
three in healthy condition.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_06_500_CUT_000_010.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_06_500_CUT_000_010.text:
Snatching 'em up while they snored
was a real solid plan, darlin'.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_06_500_CUT_000_020.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_06_500_CUT_000_020.text:
I'm just glad our research into the life
of the tsuchinoko can proceed smoothly.
Thanks again for the help!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_06_500_CUT_000_030.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_06_500_CUT_000_030.text:
And we'll probably get away with it,
'least as far as that overseer of yours
is concerned.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_06_600_CUT_000_000.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_06_600_CUT_000_000.text:
Not all of them made it
back to us unharmed...

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_06_600_CUT_000_010.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_06_600_CUT_000_010.text:
Yeah, I kinda had to
rough 'em up a little.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_06_600_CUT_000_020.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_06_600_CUT_000_020.text:
Still, I don't think that should have
a significant effect on our research.
Thank you for your help.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_06_600_CUT_000_030.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_06_600_CUT_000_030.text:
I just hope your overseer don't
put two and two together.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_06_700_CUT_000_000.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_06_700_CUT_000_000.text:
The three of them are all
a little beaten up...

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_06_700_CUT_000_010.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_06_700_CUT_000_010.text:
They put up a lot more of a tussle
than I expected, that's for sure.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_06_700_CUT_000_020.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_06_700_CUT_000_020.text:
Still, it's not like we had a choice,
so thanks all the same, alien.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_06_700_CUT_000_030.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_06_700_CUT_000_030.text:
I just hope your overseer don't
put two and two together.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_07_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_07_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Thank you for helping to retrieve those
rare specimens, alien. All of us in Green
Division owe you a debt.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_07_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_07_000_CUT_000_010.text: So you know about that, huh?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_07_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_07_000_CUT_000_020.text:
I do—and I apologize for the trouble
my researcher Qu Magis caused for you.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_07_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_07_000_CUT_000_040.text:
Um... Thank you for
your help, alien.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_07_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_07_000_CUT_000_050.text:
The overseer was quite furious with me.
She made it clear that since my negligence
put all of Delta Base at risk, I should have
reported the incident to her immediately.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_07_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_07_000_CUT_000_060.text:
On that topic, alien, I wonder if you
might be willing to monitor our
selective-breeding experiments.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_07_000_CUT_000_070.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_07_000_CUT_000_070.text:
I ain't one'a your test subjects,
and that's final! ...That said,
which traits of mine were you
lookin' to replicate, exactly?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_07_000_CUT_000_080.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_07_000_CUT_000_080.text:
This is not about breeding you, alien.
We're seeking to fuse the specimens
you helped recover with a magical bee.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_07_000_CUT_000_090.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_07_000_CUT_000_090.text:
We intend to fuse their individual
characteristics to create a new
and beneficial life-form.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_07_000_CUT_000_100.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_07_000_CUT_000_100.text: As I would hate for your impression of Green Division to be tainted by certain members of our research team, you may consider this a chance to see the kind of work we really do.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_07_000_CUT_000_110.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_07_000_CUT_000_110.text:
Well, when you put it like that,
I suppose I wouldn't mind a little
peek behind the ol' curtain.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_07_015_CUT_000_000.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_07_015_CUT_000_000.text:
Then please go observe our experiment.
You can find it on the lower level.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Beginning selective-breeding verification
experiment A, iteration 880.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_000_CUT_000_010.text:
Our goal is to use the inherent abilities
of quantum cats to increase the bee's
propagation rate and honey production.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_000_CUT_000_020.text:
We once more stand at the brink of
uncovering a core mystery of nature
and enriching our own way of life.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_000_CUT_000_030.text:
So you're just straight-up fusin' two species
together? You guys really are pushing biology
to its limits—ethical and otherwise.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_000_CUT_000_040.text:
We can instantly create new life-forms
by combining specimens that have been
placed in these fusion pods.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_000_CUT_000_050.text:
And by applying our teleportation
technology, we turn them into a
new, single being!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_000_CUT_000_060.text:
I've begun combining the genetic elements
of the quantum cat and honeybee.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_000_CUT_000_070.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_000_CUT_000_070.text:
When you hear the pod ding,
the work will be complete.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_000_CUT_000_080.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_000_CUT_000_080.text:
So cuttin'-edge scientific machinery
works like my toaster?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_000_CUT_000_140.speaker: Creature_303
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_000_CUT_000_140.text:
WE MUST       WE WILL
     TURN THIS   INTO
   NEST

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_000_CUT_000_150.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_000_CUT_000_150.text:
Oh no... No no no no no... Not good! We overshot the domesticity
level and made it intelligent!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_000_CUT_000_160.speaker: Creature_303
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_000_CUT_000_160.text:
KREE KREE KREE.
FLEE FROM US.
FLEE. FLEE. FLEE.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_000_CUT_000_170.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_000_CUT_000_170.text:
So on a scale of complete success to
utter failure... Maybe a six? Anyway, this is getting dangerous!
Let's get out of here!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_000_CUT_000_180.speaker: Bonnie_Blair

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_100_CUT_000_010.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_100_CUT_000_010.text:
Our goal is to boost the medicinal properties
of monophids and propagation rates of
honeybees, as well as increasing the
yields of honey and so forth.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_100_CUT_000_060.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_100_CUT_000_060.text:
I've begun combining the genetic
elements of the monophid and honeybee.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_200_CUT_000_010.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_200_CUT_000_010.text:
Our goal is to boost the special faculties of
tsuchinoko and propagation rates of honeybees,
as well as increasing the yields of honey
and so forth.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_200_CUT_000_060.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_200_CUT_000_060.text:
I've begun combining the genetic elements
of the tsuchinoko and honeybee.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_000_CUT_010_000.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_000_CUT_010_000.text:
I'm not sure what went wrong, but they
appear to have fused into a rather
dangerous-looking creature.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_000_CUT_010_010.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_000_CUT_010_010.text:
...Mags? What culture solution
did you use in the pods?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_000_CUT_010_030.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_000_CUT_010_030.text:
My instructions were to use formulation 098.
But sadly, I cannot afford to waste
precious time chastising you now.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_000_CUT_010_040.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_000_CUT_010_040.text:
It is possible the specimens have begun
constructing a hive on the lower floor.
Should they gain even more intelligence,
it could put all of Delta Base in danger.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_000_CUT_010_050.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_000_CUT_010_050.text:
Also, we need to give our new
life-form a name! Um, right?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_000_CUT_010_060.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_000_CUT_010_060.text:
Our target is a failed experiment officially
designated as 'Rogue Species 303.'
We in Green Division must find some way
to respond to the danger this swarm poses.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_000_CUT_010_070.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_000_CUT_010_070.text:
Maybe it ain't my place to say this,
but I think you should get some help
from the other divisions.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_000_CUT_010_080.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_000_CUT_010_080.text:
She's right! I mean, Red Division DOES
pride itself on handling odd life-forms.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_000_CUT_010_090.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_000_CUT_010_090.text:
*sigh* I suppose Green Division cannot
permit our pride to get in the way of
our greater responsibility. We must confer with Red Division.
Are you up to the task, Mags?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_000_CUT_010_100.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_000_CUT_010_100.text: Yeah, um, I don't... I mean, I'm not... No? Er, that is to say, I'm not entirely sure I'd be capable of having a productive conversation with Red Division, considering how, you know... scary they are? I mean, they're basically the war division of Delta Base, sooo...

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_000_CUT_010_110.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_000_CUT_010_110.text:
Heck, I worked with Red Division before.
Let me go talk to them fellers.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_000_CUT_010_120.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_000_CUT_010_120.text: Very well, alien. Good luck. And as for you, Mags, I expect you to make yourself extremely useful. In the meantime, I will remain here and continue to monitor Rogue Species 303. Dismissed.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_011_CUT_000_000.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_011_CUT_000_000.text:
We have been briefed by Red Division's
overseer. We know Delta Base is in
trouble due to Rogue Species 303.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_011_CUT_000_010.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_011_CUT_000_010.text:
Um, well, I guess our fusion of a new life-form
miiight have caused some unexpected genes to
manifest? Ones that draw quite strongly from
the honeybee side of its genetic composition?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_011_CUT_000_020.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_011_CUT_000_020.text:
Couldn't we just pump some insecticide
through the vents and wipe 'em out?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_011_CUT_000_030.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_011_CUT_000_030.text:
Unfortunately, we don't know how a rogue
species might react to insecticide. If we
inadvertently made them stronger, they could
easily end up being completely unmanageable.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_011_CUT_000_040.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_011_CUT_000_040.text:
Wow, hon. Congrats on creatin'
a real horror of a life-form.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_011_CUT_000_050.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_011_CUT_000_050.text:
A life-form of this type will have a queen.
Kill this queen. This will stop them.
Their proliferation will cease, halting
any further infiltration of Delta Base.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_011_CUT_000_060.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_011_CUT_000_060.text:
Yeah, but the thing is, we've yet to...
observe a queen? Or anything like one? I mean, it's also possible our security
cameras are just too far away for us
to make that kind of distinction!
That could be it.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_011_CUT_000_070.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_011_CUT_000_070.text:
So you're sayin' we'd have to fight through
a swarm of bugs just to try to spot the queen?
'Cause I doubt they'd just let us pass without
a bunch of hootin' and hollerin'.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_011_CUT_000_080.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_011_CUT_000_080.text:
You need pheromones. Apply them to yourself.
This will cause the life-forms to accept you
as an ally.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_011_CUT_000_090.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_011_CUT_000_090.text:
Good idea! We used formulation 507
for the culture solution, so we should
be able to make a pheromone out of the
monster specimens we derived it from.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_012_CUT_000_000.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_012_CUT_000_000.text:
I have applied the pheromones.
Rogue Species 303 will now
consider you an ally.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_012_CUT_000_010.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_012_CUT_000_010.text:
Dang... These here things smell worse
than an outhouse at high noon.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_012_CUT_000_020.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_012_CUT_000_020.text:
Oh, you're not smelling the pheromone!
You're actually smelling the bodily fluids 
of the monster specimen it was derived from. Er, which is its urine.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_012_CUT_000_030.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_012_CUT_000_030.text:
Guess I see why you didn't mention that
before you went and coated me with it.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_012_CUT_000_040.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_012_CUT_000_040.text:
Red Division hopes you succeed.
If you do not, we have a failsafe.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_012_CUT_000_050.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_012_CUT_000_050.text:
If we DO botch this, our standing in
Delta Base would plummet! And since
I'm the one who caused all this trouble,
I'd have no choice but to resign.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_012_CUT_000_060.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_012_CUT_000_060.text:
Why do you do this, alien?
This is not your burden.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_012_CUT_000_070.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_012_CUT_000_070.text:
Well, I can't just sit by and do nothin'.
I'm sure we'll work it out somehow.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_012_CUT_000_080.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_012_CUT_000_080.text:
I sympathize with your fate, alien.
Good luck. Return victorious.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_015_CUT_001_010.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_015_CUT_001_010.text: You quit with all this multiplyin'!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_016_CUT_000_010.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_016_CUT_000_010.text:
The pheromone is tricking
their sensory organs!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_016_CUT_000_020.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_016_CUT_000_020.text: So they really see us as allies?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_016_CUT_000_040.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_016_CUT_000_040.text:
Huh. I guess there's no
queen around here.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_016_CUT_001_010.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_016_CUT_001_010.text:
This pheromone thing's
really doing the trick!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_016_CUT_002_010.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_016_CUT_002_010.text:
I still reek like an unmucked stall,
but they ain't reactin' like before.
Think the pheromones are wearin' off?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_016_CUT_002_040.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_016_CUT_002_040.text:
Well, shoot! We're surrounded.
Gotta punch through, I guess.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_017_CUT_000_000.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_017_CUT_000_000.text:
That should be all of them, but I guess
the queen wasn't here after all.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_017_CUT_000_010.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_017_CUT_000_010.text: Hold on. You hear that buzzin'?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_017_CUT_000_020.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_017_CUT_000_020.text:
It's the queen! She must have received
a signal that we killed her underlings!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_000.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_000.text:
That's the queen down, and the whole rest
of her court, too. I reckon we're done here.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_010.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_010.text:
Thank you for your assistance, alien.
It is much appreciated.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_020.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_020.text:
And what have you learned of
Rogue Species 303, Mags?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_030.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_030.text:
Oh, tons! And I also documented
everything, of course.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_040.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_040.text:
Then perhaps we can consider this
experiment a stepping stone rather
than a failure.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_050.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_050.text:
Seems you didn't learn nothin' from this.
Well, on to the next self-inflicted crisis!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_080.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_080.text: Apologies. It is me. Shi Kat.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_100.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_100.text:
I have a message, Madam Overseer.
The other division overseers await
your report on this incident.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_110.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_110.text:
Understood. Then I guess this
is farewell for now, alien.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_120.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_120.text:
This whole thing was my fault.
I'm so, so, so, SOOO sorry!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_130.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_130.text:
Not like you to be quite
so contrite, Mags.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_140.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_140.text:
Oh, you noticed that too, alien?
Yeah, my boss sorta...ordered me
to apologize to you? But now that everything worked out,
I don't regret a thing. Plus, I'm sure
all the excitement has made your visit
to Delta Base really fun!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_150.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_150.text:
Fun ain't exactly the word I'd use, hon.
Plus, we're here lookin' for a triangle,
but I ain't got the foggiest—

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_160.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_160.text: Oh! You mean like this one?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_170.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_170.text:
That's our triangle!
It's resonating with the frame!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_180.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_180.text: Where the heck did you find that!?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_190.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_190.text:
This old thing? Oh, I've had it forever.
But you said you needed to find a triangle,
so I figured maybe this one would do.
And it looks like it does, so yay!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_200.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_200.text:
There ain't no way that's true, Mags!
That's a fib you been practicin', right?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_400_CUT_000_000.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_400_CUT_000_000.text:
I understand you've had to endure much
due to Mags's procedural and general
incompetence, alien, and I apologize.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_400_CUT_000_010.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_400_CUT_000_010.text:
Sure, but at least stuff like that
shakes up the monotony of life
here on Delta Base!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_400_CUT_000_020.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_400_CUT_000_020.text:
And speaking of life on Delta Base,
you'd be welcome in Green Division
should you choose to remain here.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_400_CUT_000_030.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_400_CUT_000_030.text:
But on another topic, while we were dealing
with this latest incident, we learned there
is an individual confined on the lower level—
one that might even be an alien like yourself.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_400_CUT_000_040.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_400_CUT_000_040.text:
Should I take that as a warning to get out
of Delta Base before we meet the same fate?
Or are you plannin' something else for us?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_400_CUT_000_050.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_400_CUT_000_050.text:
For Green Division's part, we have only
gratitude for your work here and wouldn't
dream of apprehending you. But I can't speak to the plans of
the other divisions, so it would
behoove you to show caution.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_400_CUT_000_060.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_LIF_08_400_CUT_000_060.text:
Regardless, I will make arrangements
for you to meet this other alien.
Whether or not you do so is up to you.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_010.text:
The name ain't 'alien,' feller.
It's Bonnie.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_020.text:
Well, hell! Sorry about that—didn't mean
to offend. In fact, I've actually been
waiting for you to show up! So this is the research area of Red Division.
I'm the division overseer, and this is my
data-management specialist, Shi Kat.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_030.text:
Wait, so you been waitin' for me?
No sir, I don't like the sound'a that.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_040.text:
Relax, alien! Everything's golden. Right then! So Red Division is currently
engaged in the collection of life-form data
from numerous worlds. Dangerous life-forms
in particular. Monsters, essentially.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_050.text: See, the examiners and researchers of Delta Base have been dispatched to all sorts of worlds filled with all kinds of nasty, toothy monsters. It's Red Division's job to gather data about said monsters and come up with countermeasures—and let me tell you, there is a ton of data to wrangle.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_060.text:
I am Shi Kat. The data-wrangler.
The pitiless overseer is constantly
increasing my workload. I cannot begin
to estimate when I might be finished.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_070.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_070.text:
Ha ha ha! C'mon now, Kat! Let's not go
airing our dirty laundry to the aliens! Now where was I...? Oh, right! Data. Yeah,
so once you understand a monster's nature,
you'll know whether fight or flight is the
best choice, and also how best to go about it.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_080.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_080.text:
Unknown monsters. Fiends. Phantoms.
These do we analyze. These do we classify.
There is science in turning knowledge
into usable data.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_090.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_090.text:
We're well aware, thank you! *sigh*
Sorry about that, alien. My colleague
here tends to be a bit thickheaded.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_100.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_100.text:
How about you leave me outta your internal
squabbles and get to the part where you
explain why you're waitin' for me?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_110.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_110.text:
Oh, right! That! Okay, so when you
showed up here, it actually triggered
a momentary power failure that wiped out
vital portions of our monster-data library.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_120.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_120.text: And you're blamin' that on us?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_130.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_130.text: Ha ha ha! We sure are!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_140.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_140.text:
Anyway, since this is all your fault,
we need you to go to the lower level
and track down the biochip that has
our backup monster data on it. All we know is that it's inside a container,
but just open 'em all and I'm sure you'll
eventually run across it. Good? Good.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_150.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_150.text:
We can restore the erased
data with that biochip.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_160.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_160.text:
I'll give you permission to take the lift
to the lower level. Oh, but be careful down
there! The electromagnetic gates have sorta
been on the fritz lately.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_180.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_180.text:
Aw, it's just a gate that delivers a
massively painful and dangerous electrical
shock whenever something touches it. We built the thing in case any of our
nastier research specimens ever got out.
Can't be too careful, am I right!?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_190.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_190.text:
And I suppose this screwy gate
is also my fault somehow?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_200.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_200.text:
Ha ha ha! It sure is! I mean, probably.
Anyway, safety first and all that, right?
Now good luck down there!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_01_100_CUT_000_000.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
