SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_01_100_CUT_000_000.text:
Oh hey, the biochip! Nice going!
Now we can restore that missing data.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_01_100_CUT_000_010.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_01_100_CUT_000_010.text:
You aliens are just as good as I'd hoped.
I knew you could do it.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_01_100_CUT_000_020.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_01_100_CUT_000_020.text:
Well, apparently we caused this mess,
and it seems pretty clear that we're
expected to fix it.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_01_100_CUT_000_030.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_01_100_CUT_000_030.text:
Ha ha ha! Man, what saps. Now let's see
what details of the aliens' physiology were
collected by the biochip.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_01_100_CUT_000_050.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_01_100_CUT_000_050.text:
And it would seem they're far more
compatible than anticipated.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_056_000_CUT_000_00.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_056_000_CUT_000_00.text:
Ho there, aliens! Boy, you really have
a knack for showing up exactly when
I want you to. I love it!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_056_000_CUT_000_01.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_056_000_CUT_000_01.text: You got some other task for us now?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_056_000_CUT_000_02.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_056_000_CUT_000_02.text:
You know it! When we reviewed our newest
data, we learned that some information
regarding Monster Specimen 056 was lost.
Kat here can fill you in on the details.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_056_000_CUT_000_03.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_056_000_CUT_000_03.text:
You will kindly battle Specimen 056.
As you do, we will collect its data. You are the only ones who can do this.
We require first-encounter data.
But every Red Division member has
already battled Specimen 056.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_056_000_CUT_000_04.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_056_000_CUT_000_04.text:
And there you have it! We've got Specimen 056
locked in a pen in the lower level, so just
get down there and get to thrashing it! Oh, and Kat? You're wrong about one thing:
there IS a member of Red Division who has
yet to fight the beast...and you know
JUST who I mean!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_056_000_CUT_000_05.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_056_000_CUT_000_05.text:
I cannot fight the beast. I would be slain
before any useful data could be collected.
Please go in my place, alien!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_056_000_CUT_000_06.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_056_000_CUT_000_06.text:
Well, shoot. Shi Kat gettin' squashed like
a bug ain't somethin' I need to see.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_056_000_CUT_000_07.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_056_000_CUT_000_07.text:
Ha ha! Wonderful! You've met my
expectations once again, alien. Anyway, we'll handle all the data collection
and numbers and all that nerd stuff, so you
just worry about the fighting. Good? Good.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_056_000_CUT_000_08.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_056_000_CUT_000_08.text:
I apologize for your being troubled on my behalf. 
Also, you should know this: Specimen 056 was not
captured in the wild. Instead, it was created in
a joint project with Green Division.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_056_000_CUT_000_09.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_056_000_CUT_000_09.text: You fellers are buildin' monsters? Why?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_056_000_CUT_000_10.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_056_000_CUT_000_10.text:
There are various goals we pursue.
Isolating beneficial characteristics.
Engaging in potential domestication.
So forth and so on.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_056_000_CUT_000_11.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_056_000_CUT_000_11.text:
Yes, yes, it's all simply fascinating.
Now enough with the idle chitchat!
Let's get on with the fighting!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_056_000_CUT_000_12.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_056_000_CUT_000_12.text:
For someone who doesn't do any fightin'
himself, you sure do love pushing other
folks into the ring.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_056_000_CUT_000_13.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_056_000_CUT_000_13.text:
I know, right? Sadly, overseers aren't allowed
to fight. Too valuable, too hard to replace—
you know how it is, right? Right. Sure you do.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_056_010_CUT_000_00.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_056_010_CUT_000_00.text:
So this here's the pen where you've
got Specimen 056 locked up?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_056_010_CUT_000_01.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_056_010_CUT_000_01.text:
Right you are! Now get in there and smack
the thing in the face a few times so we
can finally complete our database, 'kay?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_056_010_CUT_000_02.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_056_010_CUT_000_02.text:
C'mon, aliens! Let's see some enthusiasm!
Hup, hup! Hoo-rah! Get 'er done!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_056_010_CUT_000_03.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_056_010_CUT_000_03.text:
Can't believe this feller is who 
you chose to lead Red Division.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_056_010_CUT_000_04.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_056_010_CUT_000_04.text:
I apologize. My failings led to this.
I wish you the best of luck.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_056_020_CUT_000_00.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_056_020_CUT_000_00.text:
Oh, well DONE, aliens! I knew you wouldn't
let me down! Now we've got all the data
we need for Specimen 056!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_056_020_CUT_000_01.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_056_020_CUT_000_01.text:
Now get the data restored
already, Kat! Hop to it!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_056_020_CUT_000_03.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_056_020_CUT_000_03.text:
...For all their supposed suitability, they'd be
useless to us if they couldn't survive a battle
of that intensity—so I'm VERY glad to see
they passed the test! Ha ha ha!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_056_020_CUT_000_04.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_056_020_CUT_000_04.text:
Still, the other divisions don't seem to know
what we're attempting here—or maybe they do
and are just granting consent through silence? Eh, whatever. They're my aliens now,
and I'll do whatever I want with them.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_056_020_CUT_000_06.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_056_020_CUT_000_06.text:
Uh, howdy. Couldn't help but notice
you never gave us our reward.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_056_020_CUT_000_07.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_056_020_CUT_000_07.text:
DIDN'T I? Well, that was dumb.
Probably Kat's fault, honestly,
because you certainly deserve one!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_056_020_CUT_000_08.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_056_020_CUT_000_08.text:
That overseer feller is clearly
up to somethin' a mite shady.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_056_020_CUT_000_09.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_056_020_CUT_000_09.text:
Based on his very loud monologuing,
I think we can infer he's planning to
use us for some nefarious purpose.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_056_020_CUT_000_10.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_056_020_CUT_000_10.text:
Can we just find a dang triangle and
get the heck outta this place already?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_098_000_CUT_000_02.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_098_000_CUT_000_02.text:
You know it! When we reviewed our newest
data, we learned that some information
regarding Monster Specimen 098 was lost.
Kat here can fill you in on the details.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_098_000_CUT_000_03.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_098_000_CUT_000_03.text:
You will kindly battle Specimen 098.
As you do, we will collect its data. You are the only ones who can do this.
We require first-encounter data.
But every Red Division member has
already battled Specimen 098.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_098_000_CUT_000_04.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_098_000_CUT_000_04.text:
And there you have it! We've got Specimen 098
locked in a pen in the lower level, so just
get down there and get to thrashing it! Oh, and Kat? You're wrong about one thing:
there IS a member of Red Division who has
yet to fight the beast...and you know
JUST who I mean!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_098_000_CUT_000_08.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_098_000_CUT_000_08.text:
I apologize for your being troubled on my behalf. 
Also, you should know this: Specimen 098 was not
captured in the wild. Instead, it was created in
a joint project with Green Division.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_098_010_CUT_000_00.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_098_010_CUT_000_00.text:
So this here's the pen where you've
got Specimen 098 locked up?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_098_010_CUT_000_01.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_098_010_CUT_000_01.text:
Right you are—and we REALLY need
you to fight it so we can get our
first-encounter data.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_098_010_CUT_000_02.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_098_010_CUT_000_02.text:
I mean, you know how it is when there's a
gap in consecutively numbered files, right?
Drives you crazy!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_098_010_CUT_000_03.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_098_010_CUT_000_03.text: Well, I'll give it a shot.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_098_020_CUT_000_00.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_098_020_CUT_000_00.text:
Oh, well DONE, aliens! I knew you wouldn't
let me down! Now we've got all the data
we need for Specimen 098!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_507_000_CUT_000_02.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_507_000_CUT_000_02.text:
You know it! When we reviewed our newest
data, we learned that some information
regarding Monster Specimen 507 was lost.
Kat here can fill you in on the details.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_507_000_CUT_000_03.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_507_000_CUT_000_03.text:
You will kindly battle Specimen 507.
As you do, we will collect its data. You are the only ones who can do this.
We require first-encounter data.
But every Red Division member has
already battled Specimen 507.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_507_000_CUT_000_04.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_507_000_CUT_000_04.text:
And there you have it! We've got Specimen 507
locked in a pen in the lower level, so just
get down there and get to thrashing it! Oh, and Kat? You're wrong about one thing:
there IS a member of Red Division who has
yet to fight the beast...and you know
JUST who I mean!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_507_000_CUT_000_08.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_507_000_CUT_000_08.text:
I apologize for your being troubled on my behalf. 
Also, you should know this: Specimen 507 was not
captured in the wild. Instead, it was created in
a joint project with Green Division.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_507_010_CUT_000_00.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_507_010_CUT_000_00.text:
So this here's the pen where you've
got Specimen 507 locked up?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_507_010_CUT_000_01.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_507_010_CUT_000_01.text:
Right you are! Now get in there and smack
the thing in the face a few times so we
can finally complete our database, 'kay?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_507_010_CUT_000_02.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_507_010_CUT_000_02.text:
Just how many monster specimens
do you fellers have, anyway?
At least 507, right?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_507_010_CUT_000_03.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_507_010_CUT_000_03.text:
Our numbering system is not indicative
of the total. Specimens are destroyed.
New varieties are discovered—including
cursed and artificially developed ones. I estimate there are roughly 75,000 in all.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_507_010_CUT_000_04.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_507_010_CUT_000_04.text:
Can't believe you're makin' such a squawk
about one or two bits'a data when you got
75,000 specimens roamin' around.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_507_010_CUT_000_05.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_507_010_CUT_000_05.text:
Ah, but it's only through the accumulation
of data that fundamental truths become
revealed!< Sooo...the fighting? C'mon, let's go.
Very busy man over here.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_507_020_CUT_000_00.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_507_020_CUT_000_00.text:
Oh, well DONE, aliens! I knew you wouldn't
let me down! Now we've got all the data
we need for Specimen 507!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_440_000_CUT_000_00.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_440_000_CUT_000_00.text:
Ho there, aliens! Boy, am I ever in awe of
your knack for appearing at the right place
and at the right time. So cool!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_440_000_CUT_000_01.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_440_000_CUT_000_01.text: You need more battle data replaced?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_440_000_CUT_000_02.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_440_000_CUT_000_02.text:
Not exactly. See, while we were attempting
to update our combat data on a particular
specimen, we experienced an unexpected
infestation of parasitic slime mold.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_440_000_CUT_000_04.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_440_000_CUT_000_04.text:
The slime mold is consuming all of our
monster specimens AND multiplying
at an almost unbelievable rate.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_440_000_CUT_000_05.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_440_000_CUT_000_05.text:
Thing is, most of Red Division has been sent
offworld on official business, and we don't
have the strength to fight it. And yeah, sure, we could ask the
other divisions for help, but yuck!
Who wants to do that? Not me.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_440_000_CUT_000_06.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_440_000_CUT_000_06.text:
Sound like famous last words to me.
If you don't get 'em involved now,
you're gonna regret it later.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_440_000_CUT_000_07.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_440_000_CUT_000_07.text:
And that's exactly why I am seeking
outside help—from YOU, aliens!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_440_000_CUT_000_08.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_440_000_CUT_000_08.text:
I'm currently working up an analysis of the
slime mold's properties that I should have
finished up here shortly.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_440_000_CUT_000_09.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_440_000_CUT_000_09.text:
So you're going to help us, right?
Sure you are!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_440_002_CUT_000_00.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_440_002_CUT_000_00.text:
Well, aliens? How about it?
Will you help us?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_440_002_CUT_000_01.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_440_002_CUT_000_01.text:
We have come to understand a few
aspects of the slime mold's nature.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_440_002_CUT_000_02.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_440_002_CUT_000_02.text:
We can obstruct its movements
with our electromagnetic gates.
These gates have been activated.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_440_002_CUT_000_03.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_440_002_CUT_000_03.text:
You can deactivate individual gates
by using switches near containers.
However, they cannot be reactivated.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_440_002_CUT_000_04.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_440_002_CUT_000_04.text:
Okay, so our sensors picked up three swarms
of slimes. Or packs. Or, uh, whatever slimes
travel around in. Herds, maybe? Oh, and when this is all over,
there's a reward waiting for you!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_440_002_CUT_000_05.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_440_002_CUT_000_05.text:
I got a hunch that reward ain't 
all you'll have waiting for us.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_440_002_CUT_000_08.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_440_002_CUT_000_08.text:
What does this overseer feller
even want from us...?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_440_020_CUT_000_00.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_440_020_CUT_000_00.text:
Well, this is just strange...
We've never seen this particular
variety of slime mold before!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_440_030_CUT_000_01.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_440_030_CUT_000_01.text: This should be the last of 'em!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_440_041_CUT_000_00.speaker: RedTribe_SoldierZ
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_440_041_CUT_000_00.text:
This slime mold looks like your everyday
garden-variety stuff, but it's actually
some sort of new species or subspecies.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_440_041_CUT_000_01.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_440_041_CUT_000_01.text:
A discovery of this nature must be
reported to the other divisions.
This is correct, yes?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_440_041_CUT_000_02.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_440_041_CUT_000_02.text:
Oh, Kat! You and your rules! Look, involving the other divisions
is only going to complicate things.
Bureaucracy, paperwork, infighting...
Blech, am I right!? I'll just handle it myself.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_440_041_CUT_000_03.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_440_041_CUT_000_03.text:
Is there some reason you don't want
the other divisions to know about this?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_440_041_CUT_000_04.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_440_041_CUT_000_04.text:
Look, outsider. There are all sorts of inter-
divisional tensions that you just don't get.
If I let them know about this, they'll see
us as weak—and I'm NOT letting that happen!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_440_041_CUT_000_05.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_440_041_CUT_000_05.text:
Well heck, what do I know?
I'm just an 'outsider.'

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_440_042_CUT_000_00.speaker: RedTribe_SoldierY
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_440_042_CUT_000_00.text:
We believe the slime mold has emerged from
the containment unit of Specimen 440,
Mr. Overseer, sir!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_440_042_CUT_000_01.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_440_042_CUT_000_01.text:
Specimen 440... Yes, of course.
Exactly as I suspected.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_440_042_CUT_000_02.speaker: RedTribe_SoldierY
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_440_042_CUT_000_02.text:
The containment unit has been destroyed from
the inside, sir, and the slime mold seems to have
been feeding off of the specimen it contained.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_440_042_CUT_000_03.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_440_042_CUT_000_03.text:
We must report this at once.
Yellow Division must know.
Green Division must know.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_440_042_CUT_000_04.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_440_042_CUT_000_04.text:
Slow down there, speedy!
We'll hold off on that report until we've
had time to conduct a full investigation.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_440_042_CUT_000_05.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_440_042_CUT_000_05.text:
So you DO know more than you let on.
What's the significance of 440, feller,
and why are we all tied up in this?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_440_042_CUT_000_06.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_440_042_CUT_000_06.text:
Well, I suppose you've earned
a few answers, my alien friend. Right as you arrived here, Specimen 440
woke up. But just as we were getting
ready to analyze its combat potential,
the slime mold infestation began.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_440_042_CUT_000_07.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_440_042_CUT_000_07.text:
We naturally suspected that your arrival
was connected to Specimen 440, but needed
actual evidence this was the case. And guess what? We were right!
The two are most definitely related.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_440_042_CUT_000_08.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_440_042_CUT_000_08.text:
You're sayin' our presence caused this,
but you also said our comin' here caused
a power failure. Couldn't that have been
the reason for the infestation?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_440_042_CUT_000_09.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_440_042_CUT_000_09.text:
Yes, that seems plausible. We were observing
whether or not the slime mold would react
to your presence, but so far we've seen
zero evidence of that.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_440_042_CUT_000_10.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_440_042_CUT_000_10.text:
Anyway, that's why we're going to need your
continued participation for just a teensy
bit longer! You're good with that, right?
Sure you are.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_440_042_CUT_000_11.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_440_042_CUT_000_11.text:
I don't see why slime mold would give one hoot
about me or Formina, but we'll stick around if
you wanna research that for yourself.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_440_043_CUT_000_00.speaker: RedTribe_SoldierX
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_440_043_CUT_000_00.text:
Sir, none of the characteristics of this
infestation match the data of known slime
molds in our database. I feel it would be
best to inform the other divisions.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_440_043_CUT_000_01.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_440_043_CUT_000_01.text:
I understand, soldier—well,
in the sense I acknowledge that
as your personal point of view.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_440_043_CUT_000_02.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_440_043_CUT_000_02.text:
Uh, thank you, sir? So should I issue
an official interdivisional report?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_440_043_CUT_000_05.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_440_043_CUT_000_05.text:
440 is a unique specimen,
and I'm not going to let the other
divisions start meddling with it.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_440_043_CUT_000_06.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_440_043_CUT_000_06.text:
Why, if the specimen was destroyed,
all of my amazing plans for it
would amount to nothing!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_440_043_CUT_000_07.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_440_043_CUT_000_07.text: And do these plans involve us?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_440_043_CUT_000_08.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_440_043_CUT_000_08.text:
These plans, alien, are something I hatched
before I even became overseer. They have
nothing to do with your appearance.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_440_060_CUT_000_00.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_440_060_CUT_000_00.text:
The slime molds are returning
to the containment unit!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_440_060_CUT_000_01.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_440_060_CUT_000_01.text:
I've confirmed the presence of Specimen 440.
Looks like that damn slime mold destroyed
the containment unit from the inside and
consumed all of its bodily tissue!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_440_060_CUT_000_02.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_440_060_CUT_000_02.text: That unit is full'a slime mold?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_440_060_CUT_000_03.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_440_060_CUT_000_03.text:
This unit contains a mummified human male.
The slime mold seems to be functioning as
tentacular appendages that are providing
nutrition to the mummy.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_440_060_CUT_000_04.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_440_060_CUT_000_04.text:
But if the feller's mummified, how is he alive?
And how does slime mold provide him nutrition?
If all'a this is true, pardner, then what you're
describin' ain't nothin' but a monster.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_440_060_CUT_000_05.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_440_060_CUT_000_05.text:
Oh, he's no monster. See, the slime mold activity
was a clear sign the mummy was preparing to rise
from its slumber—we just didn't expect it to
happen so quickly! Ugh. What a pain.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_440_060_CUT_000_06.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_440_060_CUT_000_06.text:
So as far as you're concerned,
this is all goin' peachy?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_440_060_CUT_000_07.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_440_060_CUT_000_07.text:
I wish! But no, totally unrelated.
We need to bring that slime mold under
control, which means we have to fight
the thing again.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_440_060_CUT_000_08.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_440_060_CUT_000_08.text:
And by 'we,' I'm guessin' you mean me,
Formina, and nobody from Red Division.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_440_070_CUT_000_00.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_440_070_CUT_000_00.text:
Okay! The slime mold has been brought
under control, which means we can
finally resume the experiment.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_440_070_CUT_000_01.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_440_070_CUT_000_01.text:
Lemme guess: it involves cajolin' aliens
into fightin' some critter so you can get
a bunch'a dang combat data.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_440_070_CUT_000_02.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_440_070_CUT_000_02.text:
Oh, I DO so appreciate how much
of my time you save with your
quick grasp of these situations! You are indeed correct, alien. Also, I can tell
by the sarcasm in that last question that you may
be tiring of this, so let me just say that if you
refuse, I'll have to make Shi Kat do it instead.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_440_070_CUT_000_03.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_440_070_CUT_000_03.text:
I reckon he wouldn't be
much good at that.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_440_070_CUT_000_04.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_440_070_CUT_000_04.text:
Oh, I know I wouldn't get the results
I wanted when poor Shi Kat was inevitably
turned into a pulsating pile of goo—but
I bet I'd end up with SOMETHING!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_440_070_CUT_000_05.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_440_070_CUT_000_05.text: That's a bad joke, even for you.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_440_070_CUT_000_06.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_440_070_CUT_000_06.text:
I'm going to take that as a yes.
Now come on, aliens! Hop to it!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_00.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_00.text:
As always, aliens, I'm grateful for your
cooperation. Let's start the experiment!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_01.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_01.text:
This could lead to another slime mold
infestation. We should enlist the
assistance of Green Division.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_02.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_02.text:
Mr. Kat, did I just hear you volunteer to help
us gather combat data in the aliens' stead?
I mean, you ARE a member of Red Division,
so that would be the more preferable outcome.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_03.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_03.text:
No, Overseer. I said nothing.
Good luck to you, aliens.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_04.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_04.text:
Right then! Let me start by explaining the
properties of the slime mold. Basically,
they function as a colony with the ability to
mimic the appearance and behaviors of a host.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_05.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_05.text: And how do you know all this?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_06.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_06.text:
I know it because I was the one
who discovered this species! See, the objective of this experiment isn't just
to gather combat data: it's a second attempt at
an experiment I conducted over 3,000 cycles ago—
one thought to have ended in failure!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_07.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_07.text:
The goal of that experiment was to acquire
stronger bodies by using parasitic slime
molds that could consume, fuse with,
and gain the powers of their hosts. We theorized that a host possessed of a
powerful will might be able to gain the
slime's powers while still retaining their
own autonomy after being consumed.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_08.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_08.text:
But the experiment ended in failure,
and the test specimen was sealed away
inside this capsule. He is known as the Beast King—number 440.
We'd worked together as researchers countless
times, and he was the only member of Red Division
I ever considered to be a partner.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_09.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_09.text:
You lost your partner in a failed experiment?
Sad as that is, I ain't really seein' what that
has to do with this one.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_10.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_10.text:
It has EVERYTHING to do with
this experiment, alien! You aliens are strong—so strong, in fact, that when
the slime mold attempts to take control of you,
you may be powerful enough to resist it and
gain its ability for yourselves! Also, if you end up being taken over by the
slime, the Beast King will be free of its control
and come back to life. See? Win-win!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_11.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_11.text:
Can't believe I got dragged into this farce
of an experiment 'cause you think your
mummified buddy is still kickin'.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_12.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_12.text:
Specimen 440 is a colony of slime mold.
It is not the Beast King.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_13.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_13.text:
Silence, insect! What do you know of the
Beast King and slime mold!? Nothing! Oh, but don't worry, aliens! Should one of you
end up being consumed by the slime mold,
you'll just live on in a mummified form!
Pretty neat, right? SO neat!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_14.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_14.text:
You must escape at once, aliens.
The overseer's behavior has
become dangerously erratic.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_15.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_15.text:
Nothin' doin'! You just open that unit up,
Shi Kat. We'll destroy the mold and bring
this whole dumb experiment to an end.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_16.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_16.text:
Aaah ha ha ha! I LOVE it, alien!
You have such AMBITION! Now go! Do it! Fight that slime
mold and GIVE IT ALL YA GOT!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_17.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_17.text:
You are certain, aliens?
Then I will do it.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_18.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_18.text:
Oh, I'll do it, all right...
And there we go. Capsule open!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_19.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_19.text:
So you're the Beast King? I'm guessing
that suit of yours is just full'a slime mold,
but we'll have to tussle to find out!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_20.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_20.text:
What!? No! Stop, you stupid slime!
You're supposed to attack the aliens!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_22.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_22.text:
Specimen 440 is moving to another part
of the base. I speculate it is seeking
more suitable prey.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_23.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_23.text:
No! No, that's not it at ALL! Don't you see!? It's him! It's the Beast King!
He's looking for his beloved sword!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_002_CUT_000_01.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_002_CUT_000_01.text:
He has been arrested by decree of the
Council of Overseers, and will likely
be dismissed from his duties soon.
I have been appointed acting overseer.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_002_CUT_000_02.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_002_CUT_000_02.text:
Well, good for you! Er, so what's
the deal with Specimen 440?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_002_CUT_000_03.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_002_CUT_000_03.text:
We activated the electromagnetic gate
to keep it contained, but do not know
how long it will hold.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_002_CUT_000_04.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_002_CUT_000_04.text:
A portion of the slime mold managed to slip
through the gate before it was activated.
We do not know its present location.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_002_CUT_000_05.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_002_CUT_000_05.text:
The former overseer said the Beast King
was goin' off to find some sword?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_002_CUT_000_06.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_002_CUT_000_06.text:
That sword is an artifact. 
Yellow Division is in charge of artifacts.
We should contact them about this.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_003_CUT_000_00.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_003_CUT_000_00.text:
The electronic gate to the monster pens
has been broken. This is likely due to
the slime mold. I believe it is seeking
further prey to consume.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_003_CUT_000_01.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_003_CUT_000_01.text:
If we do not address this situation,
the monsters will be absorbed by the
Beast King. This will make him very
powerful. We will not be able to fight him.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_003_CUT_000_02.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_003_CUT_000_02.text:
I know the other monsters don't deserve this,
but maybe we oughta exterminate 'em before
the Beast King can do that?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_003_CUT_000_03.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_003_CUT_000_03.text:
We should collaborate with Green Division.
They can gas the area. This will put the
monsters into a state of paralysis.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_003_CUT_000_04.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_003_CUT_000_04.text:
And if they can't move, even a scrawny
thing like you can manhandle 'em!
Er, or bughandle 'em, I suppose.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_003_CUT_000_05.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_003_CUT_000_05.text:
Yes. This will prevent us from
losing any of our precious samples.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_004_CUT_000_00.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_004_CUT_000_00.text:
Howdy, Mr. Actin' Overseer.
Think you can lower the gate
so I can get to the Beast King?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_004_CUT_000_01.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_004_CUT_000_01.text:
Are you sure? Have you made
all the necessary preparations?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_004_CUT_000_03.speaker: HERO
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_004_CUT_000_03.text: Just hang on a tick there.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_014_CUT_000_00.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_014_CUT_000_00.text:
Whoa, crazy. I can't believe the
Beast King's causing trouble again.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_014_CUT_000_01.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_014_CUT_000_01.text: Again? When was the first time?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_014_CUT_000_02.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_014_CUT_000_02.text:
Yeah, so a while back, somebody from Red
Division stole a cursed sword from us.
We all figured the Beast King was behind it,
but he always refused to admit it. Anyway, one day he up and died,
and we ended up getting it back.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_014_CUT_000_03.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_014_CUT_000_03.text:
I mean, stealing a cursed sword and
keeping it until you die? What a loon!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_014_CUT_000_04.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_014_CUT_000_04.text:
I cannot speak to his motives,
but please allow Red Division to take
custody of that sword once more. A normal artifact container will not suffice.
It must be kept safe from the slime mold.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_014_CUT_000_05.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_014_CUT_000_05.text:
Oh man, aliens! You got yourselves
mixed up in something weird again!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_014_CUT_000_06.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_014_CUT_000_06.text:
It sure looks that way, Bean.
We could really use your help.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_014_CUT_000_07.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_014_CUT_000_07.text:
No worries! One cursed sword,
coming right up.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_014_CUT_000_08.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_014_CUT_000_08.text: Actually, question: why do you keep calling it a cursed sword?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_014_CUT_000_09.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_014_CUT_000_09.text:
Oh, because anyone who wields it is
cursed with horrible, never-ending pain!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_011_CUT_000_00.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_011_CUT_000_00.text:
Well, we got us the cursed sword, but I guess
only the former overseer knows why the
Beast King stole it in the first place.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_011_CUT_000_02.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_011_CUT_000_02.text:
Seems like a real fine sword.
Think we could use it?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_011_CUT_000_04.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_011_CUT_000_04.text:
You ever seen this sword
before, pardner?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_011_CUT_000_06.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_011_CUT_000_06.text:
Yellow Division said your old buddy
stole this from 'em. You know why?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_011_CUT_000_07.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_011_CUT_000_07.text:
We calculated that the power of that sword's
curse prevented the slime mold from taking over
his consciousness—and we were RIGHT!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_011_CUT_000_08.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_011_CUT_000_08.text:
The Beast King got the power of the slime mold
without being consumed by it, and it was
all thanks to that curse!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_011_CUT_000_09.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_011_CUT_000_09.text:
Sadly, the power of the curse ate away
at his mind and made him REALLY violent. Eventually we had to take the sword away,
at which point he was immediately consumed
by the slime mold.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_011_CUT_000_10.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_011_CUT_000_10.text:
That don't add up. If the Beast King was able
to weaken slime mold with that sword's curse,
why would he want it back now that he's just
a pile'a that same slime mold?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_011_CUT_000_11.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_011_CUT_000_11.text:
Because his strong will is still working
AGAINST the slime mold. He wants to
reclaim the sword—and in doing so,
reclaim his very self! Please, you have to help him!
Give him that sword! I beg you!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_011_CUT_000_12.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_011_CUT_000_12.text:
Yeah, but then your buddy starts runnin' wild
again, which don't really strike me as a better
option. I think we need to find a way to beat
the Beast King without the sword.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_011_CUT_000_13.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_011_CUT_000_13.text:
Think you better hang on to this,
Mr. Actin' Overseer.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_012_CUT_000_00.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_012_CUT_000_00.text: You ain't gettin' away, Beast King!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_012_CUT_000_01.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_012_CUT_000_01.text:
Here, Beast King! It's your sword!
Take it and reclaim yourself!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_012_CUT_000_02.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_012_CUT_000_02.text: The heck's THAT guy doing here!?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_012_CUT_000_04.speaker: RedTribe_440
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_012_CUT_000_04.text: I am the Beast King...and I am REBORN!

SUB_W10_GIMK_BOFO_MON_KATANA_000_000.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_GIMK_BOFO_MON_KATANA_000_000.text:
Well, that's curtains for
the slime mold, at least.

SUB_W10_GIMK_BOFO_MON_KATANA_000_010.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_GIMK_BOFO_MON_KATANA_000_010.text:
He managed to free himself
of the slime mold at last.

SUB_W10_GIMK_BOFO_MON_KATANA_000_020.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_GIMK_BOFO_MON_KATANA_000_020.text:
And now it's time for us
to free him from all'a this.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_006_CUT_000_00.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_006_CUT_000_00.text: I'm terribly sorry to bother you.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_006_CUT_000_01.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_006_CUT_000_01.text:
Ah, it's you. I received word of your request
from my researchers. We're happy to cooperate,
but take no responsibility for what happens
to your samples as a result of the gas.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_006_CUT_000_02.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_006_CUT_000_02.text:
Hello again, aliens. You seem to have
quite the habit of getting swept up
in these sorts of things, don't you?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_006_CUT_000_03.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_006_CUT_000_03.text:
Reckon it's just been our destiny.
But I tell you this—never again.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_006_CUT_000_04.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_006_CUT_000_04.text: Mags, help them prepare the gas.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_006_CUT_000_05.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_006_CUT_000_05.text: I'll take care of this, alien.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_006_CUT_000_06.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_006_CUT_000_06.text:
Wait, MAGS is preparin' the gas!?
I don't like that no how!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_006_CUT_000_07.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_006_CUT_000_07.text:
Mags, you sure you got this right?
I mean, it ain't gonna... Oh, I dunno.
Accidentally transform the monsters
into even stronger monsters, maybe?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_006_CUT_000_08.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_006_CUT_000_08.text:
Oh, it certainly might! ...Er, sorry.
Did the overseer not make that clear?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_006_CUT_000_09.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_006_CUT_000_09.text:
Okay, the gas is ready. We can use the tank
on the lower level to disperse it throughout
the area, so let's get moving.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_007_CUT_000_00.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_007_CUT_000_00.text:
This is Green Division's gas tank.
Er, but it's primarily used for the
creation and cooling of fresh air,
and not for spreading poison.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_007_CUT_000_01.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_007_CUT_000_01.text:
The gas should have a sedative effect on the
monsters. We don't dare use anything close to
a lethal dose, because that might cause some
very big problems for the rest of the base.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_007_CUT_000_02.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_007_CUT_000_02.text:
A wise decision. Our division is
composed of beings from a variety
of different species, after all.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_007_CUT_000_03.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_007_CUT_000_03.text:
A mistake here would
be real bad, Mags.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_007_CUT_000_04.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_007_CUT_000_04.text:
Okay, the gas I derived from the
monophid seeds is in the tank.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_007_CUT_000_05.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_007_CUT_000_05.text:
All you gotta do now
is flip the switch!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_007_CUT_000_08.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_007_CUT_000_08.text:
It...worked? It WORKED!
Mags, you beautiful genius!
You've done it again!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_010_CUT_000_00.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_010_CUT_000_00.text:
No, Beast King! Don't die!
You can't leave me!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_010_CUT_000_01.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_010_CUT_000_01.text:
Poor guy's been kept alive by slime mold
for 3,000 cycles. I reckon it's high time
y'all let him find some peace.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_010_CUT_000_02.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_010_CUT_000_02.text:
...No! There's still a chance! I command you to eat me, slime mold!
Take your nourishment from me so
the Beast King might live again!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_010_CUT_000_03.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_010_CUT_000_03.text:
Even you ain't this stupid, darlin'.
Give it up already!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_010_CUT_000_04.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_010_CUT_000_04.text:
It's happening! The consciousness of all
the life-forms the slime mold has ever
consumed are flowing into me! Ah! The Beast King is here too!
Oh, my friend, how I've missed you!
If only I'd known this back then!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_010_CUT_000_05.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_010_CUT_000_05.text:
Kat! I order you to seal us in that capsule
and number it 440A. Should a slime-removal
technique be discovered, you are to...to...

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_010_CUT_000_07.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_010_CUT_000_07.text:
I owe you an apology for all we put you
aliens through. But now I must ensure
capsule 440A is properly sealed.
We will speak later.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_010_CUT_000_08.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_010_CUT_000_08.text:
So this is over? I got no idea
how to feel about that.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_020_CUT_000_00.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_020_CUT_000_00.text:
Greetings, aliens. I apologize for involving
you in so many irregular situations.
I assure you the overseer and the Beast King
are now safely asleep in Capsule 440A.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_020_CUT_000_01.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_020_CUT_000_01.text:
Correction, Shi Kat—Red Division's
overseer is standin' right there! Congratulations, hon! I hear they went 
and made it all official.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_020_CUT_000_02.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_020_CUT_000_02.text:
A being like myself? Leading Red Division?
I cannot believe it.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_020_CUT_000_03.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_020_CUT_000_03.text:
I viewed my predecessor as a reckless being.
A human too chaotic to even process his own data.
But I saw what happened to him in the end,
and realize the Beast King was his true friend. I have no one like that in my life.
I have no friends. I...envy him.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_020_CUT_000_04.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_020_CUT_000_04.text:
Yeah, it's a pretty special thing to live a
life so true to your own feelings like that.
I mean, sure, it almost got us murdered
and fed to a pile'a sentient ooze, but still.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_020_CUT_000_05.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_020_CUT_000_05.text:
We would not have resolved this matter without
you, aliens. You have set aside your own goals 
for the sake of Delta Base. We all thank you.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_020_CUT_000_06.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_020_CUT_000_06.text:
We never wanted to be a part of this.
We got pulled into it, and then one thing
led to a whole heap of anothers.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_020_CUT_000_07.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_020_CUT_000_07.text:
Nevertheless, Red Division is grateful.
Oh, and the overseer left this for you.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_020_CUT_000_07.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_END_020_CUT_000_07.text:
That's our triangle!
It's resonating with the frame!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_056_999_CUT_000_00.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_056_999_CUT_000_00.text:
Uh, this is Specimen 056, alien.
We don't need data for this one.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_056_999_CUT_000_01.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_056_999_CUT_000_01.text:
Data for this monster already exists.
There is no need to fight it.
I would advise against it.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_098_999_CUT_000_00.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_098_999_CUT_000_00.text:
Uh, this is Specimen 098, alien.
We don't need data for this one.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_098_999_CUT_000_01.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_098_999_CUT_000_01.text:
Data for this monster already exists.
There is no need to fight it.
I would advise against it.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_507_999_CUT_000_00.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_507_999_CUT_000_00.text:
Uh, this is Specimen 507, alien.
We don't need data for this one.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_507_999_CUT_000_01.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_MAG_507_999_CUT_000_01.text:
Data for this monster already exists.
There is no need to fight it.
I would advise against it.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_01_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_01_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Oh, hey! Welcome to Yellow Division, 
where we conduct research on the 
civilizations of various worlds. So you're an alien, right? Cool, cool.
The subjects of our research don't
usually come to us—or at least that's
what the division overseer told me.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_01_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_01_000_CUT_000_010.text: Is everyone in Yellow Division a robot?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_01_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_01_000_CUT_000_020.text:
Oh, if only! I'm Unit B888888, dispatched
from Administration to take over the
overseer's managerial duties. I'm actually the only robot assigned to
Yellow Division. Oh, and everybody here
calls me 'Bean.' Hilarious, right!?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_01_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_01_000_CUT_000_030.text:
The Yellow Division overseer has been in
pretty poor health lately, so he's resting
up at the medical facility. But the work doesn't care when a guy's sick,
and it just keeps pilin' up! That's why they
sent me here to help out.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_01_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_01_000_CUT_000_040.text:
Which reminds me, I was supposed to
do something... Oh, right! Deliver the
aliens promptly to the overseer.
Guess we better get on that. C'mon!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_01_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_01_000_CUT_000_050.text: You're a lot pushier than you look.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_01_003_CUT_000_000.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_01_003_CUT_000_000.text:
Greetings, alien. I am pleased you've come
to visit us, and would like to ask you
many questions about your home world.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_01_003_CUT_000_010.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_01_003_CUT_000_010.text:
Hello. My name is Formina—and I trust you're
the Yellow Division overseer? I heard you were
unwell; I hope you're feeling better.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_01_003_CUT_000_020.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_01_003_CUT_000_020.text:
It appears you hail from a world rich in 
compassion—or so I gather from the fact
you are inquiring about the health of
a complete stranger. But let us start over, as in my
excitement I have quite shamefully
failed to introduce myself.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_01_003_CUT_000_030.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_01_003_CUT_000_030.text:
I am indeed the Yellow Division overseer,
and my health is indeed rapidly worsening.
In truth, I do not know how much time I have. But perhaps my luck is turning, for here,
in my moment of deepest despair, you have
appeared—and through you, I will gain
all manner of new knowledge!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_01_003_CUT_000_040.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_01_003_CUT_000_040.text:
I fear you'll be disappointed at the extent
of my knowledge, but I'm happy to share
what little I possess. I'm a police officer from a place called
Capitol City. If you're not familiar with
the concept of police, it's an organization
that maintains order based on laws created—

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_01_003_CUT_000_050.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_01_003_CUT_000_050.text:
A moment, please. I haven't the strength
to absorb all you have to say. Bean, have you made preparations to
conduct a full research interview?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_01_003_CUT_000_060.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_01_003_CUT_000_060.text:
Yeah, about that. The research scientists
are still down in the lower-level archives,
so I couldn't put a plan together. Those guys! They probably got their noses
caught in some dusty old tome and lost all
track of time! Ha ha ha!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_01_003_CUT_000_070.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_01_003_CUT_000_070.text:
Ah, I know the feeling when you're trying
to get something done and a good book
has you in its clutches... Well, if they're not coming back,
Bonnie and I could go down and
check on them, I suppose.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_01_003_CUT_000_080.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_01_003_CUT_000_080.text:
You have my gratitude once more, aliens,
and I find my interest in your world
deepening rapidly. Bean, would you be so kind as to
help the aliens find the researchers?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_01_004_CUT_000_000.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_01_004_CUT_000_000.text:
I didn't want to worry the overseer,
but the researchers are actually studying
ancient cursed tomes. So, uh, they've
probably been cursed, is my guess.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_01_004_CUT_000_010.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_01_004_CUT_000_010.text:
I find it hard to believe that cursed tomes
actually exist, but it's hard to explain why
they wouldn't have come back otherwise.
Anyway, I suppose we should go check it out.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_01_004_CUT_000_020.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_01_004_CUT_000_020.text:
Splendid! I'll activate the lift and we
can go down together. Thanks for all
your help here, alien!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_01_010_CUT_000_000.speaker: YellowTribe_FellowC
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_01_010_CUT_000_000.text:
I opened this ancient text purely out
of curiosity and was promptly cursed.
Now I can't move and everything hurts.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_01_010_CUT_000_010.speaker: YellowTribe_FellowC
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_01_010_CUT_000_010.text: The fiend that was sealed within the volume wishes to use my body in order to manifest itself in reality. And while that's likely going to be terribly unpleasant in the end, I am appreciating the opportunity to experience a curse firsthand!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_01_010_CUT_000_020.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_01_010_CUT_000_020.text:
Whoa! A fiend sealed in a tome is
manifesting itself through a curse?
We have to document this!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_01_010_CUT_000_030.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_01_010_CUT_000_030.text: Uh, aren't we here to rescue them?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_01_010_CUT_000_050.speaker: YellowTribe_FellowC
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_01_010_CUT_000_050.text:
Thank you very much. Now if you'll excuse me,
I need to go and document what happened back
at the division office.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_01_010_CUT_000_060.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_01_010_CUT_000_060.text:
Is everyone in Yellow Division
completely obsessed with research?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_01_010_CUT_000_080.speaker: YellowTribe_FellowC
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_01_010_CUT_000_080.text: So the curse can also be lifted by slaying the associated fiend? I must document this! ...Urgh. Oh dear. While I'm happy the curse is lifted, I'm somehow in even more pain now.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_01_010_CUT_000_100.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_01_010_CUT_000_100.text: He has no one to blame but himself!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_01_020_CUT_000_000.speaker: YellowTribe_FellowD
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_01_020_CUT_000_000.text:
When I started reading this ancient tome,
it unleashed some manner of horrible curse.
Now I can't move. Ugh.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_01_020_CUT_000_010.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_01_020_CUT_000_010.text:
Now THIS is interesting! It appears to be a
DNA conversion script that turns its reader
into a fiend! I've gotta try that sometime...

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_01_020_CUT_000_030.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_01_020_CUT_000_030.text:
It's so odd that there are curses in
a world as high-tech as this one.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_01_020_CUT_000_040.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_01_020_CUT_000_040.text: There are curses that function through mechanical engineering, you know.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_01_020_CUT_000_070.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_01_020_CUT_000_070.text:
This is some extremely valuable curse
data! Time to download it to the ol'
memory banks...

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_01_020_CUT_000_080.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_01_020_CUT_000_080.text:
It appears that by slaying the monster,
the DNA conversion reverses itself.
What an advanced curse!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_01_020_CUT_000_090.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_01_020_CUT_000_090.text:
Then it's a good thing
we saved them in time.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_01_020_CUT_000_100.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_01_020_CUT_000_100.text:
The conversion script has disappeared!
Fight it again, please!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_01_030_CUT_000_000.speaker: YellowTribe_FellowE
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_01_030_CUT_000_000.text:
When we read the tome, our backs froze up
and we couldn't move. I surmise that we
have all been cursed.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_01_030_CUT_000_010.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_01_030_CUT_000_010.text:
Guys, come on! You were sent here in a group
of three specifically so you could watch each
other and make sure no one looked at, read,
or opened anything!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_01_030_CUT_000_020.speaker: YellowTribe_FellowE
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_01_030_CUT_000_020.text:
Sorry, but...you know. Researchers?
Our curiosity got the better of us.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_01_030_CUT_000_040.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_01_030_CUT_000_040.text:
Dear me. When curiosity overcomes
reason, things go terribly wrong.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_01_030_CUT_000_070.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_01_030_CUT_000_070.text:
Honestly, I didn't expect the curses
to take effect so quickly.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_01_030_CUT_000_080.speaker: YellowTribe_FellowE
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_01_030_CUT_000_080.text:
We never should have
read those books.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_01_030_CUT_000_090.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_01_030_CUT_000_090.text:
Consider yourself lucky that slaying
those fiends lifted the curses!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_01_040_CUT_000_000.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_01_040_CUT_000_000.text:
Now that all of our researchers are safe,
it's time for me to head back and prepare
your qualitative research interview.
Thanks for your patience, friend!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_01_040_CUT_000_010.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_01_040_CUT_000_010.text:
Oh, right, the research interview.
I forgot all about that.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_01_040_CUT_000_020.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_01_040_CUT_000_020.text:
Eh, who can blame you? I mean, you just
learned curses are real, which is wild!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_01_090_CUT_010_000.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_01_090_CUT_010_000.text:
Will you attempt to dispel
the curse for us, alien?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_01_100_CUT_000_000.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_01_100_CUT_000_000.text: Are you ready for the interview?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_01_100_CUT_000_010.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_01_100_CUT_000_010.text:
Yeah, about that. When I reported the cursed
tomes incident to the overseer, he ordered me
to continue researching them, seeing as I'm
immune to curses and all. Anyway, looks like your interview is
gonna have to wait.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_01_100_CUT_000_020.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_01_100_CUT_000_020.text:
Are you sure that's wise? I mean,
if curses are real, who's to say
they can't affect robots?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_01_100_CUT_000_030.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_01_100_CUT_000_030.text:
Okay, why would you even say that!?
Are you TRYING to scare me here?
Of course I'm immune! ...Right?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_01_100_CUT_000_040.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_01_100_CUT_000_040.text:
Ha ha ha! Yeah, I'm just teasing you.
I'm sure you'll be fine.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_01_100_CUT_000_050.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_01_100_CUT_000_050.text:
Ugh. UGH. Now I'm just a nervous wreck about
this whole thing. But I can't say 'no' to an
overseer on his deathbed, sooo...

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_01_100_CUT_000_060.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_01_100_CUT_000_060.text:
If you get cursed, you know
we'll break it for you, Bean!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_04_099_CUT_000_000.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_04_099_CUT_000_000.text: Hmm? There's something in my pocket.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_04_099_CUT_000_010.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_04_099_CUT_000_010.text:
It looks like a page torn from a book.
Where did this come from?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_04_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: YellowTribe_FellowC
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_04_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Heavens, alien! That looks like a page
from the mysterious tome known as
the Necronomicon!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_04_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_04_000_CUT_000_010.text:
Is it? I reckon we found it in one
of the Red Division containers.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_04_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: YellowTribe_FellowC
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_04_000_CUT_000_030.text:
Yes, that's a Necronomicon page, all right.
This is highly auspicious: that book is said
to tear out its own pages and grant good
fortune to whoever returns them.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_04_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: YellowTribe_FellowC
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_04_000_CUT_000_040.text:
Might I have that page?
I'm DYING to test that theory!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_04_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_04_000_CUT_000_050.text:
If it's lucky, I'd rather keep
the thing for myself, darlin'.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_04_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: YellowTribe_FellowC
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_04_000_CUT_000_060.text:
Tsk! Should have just kept my mouth shut.
But if the Necronomicon flays your flesh
from your bones, don't come crying to me!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_04_010_CUT_000_000.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_04_010_CUT_000_000.text: Should I return the page to the book?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_04_020_CUT_000_000.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_04_020_CUT_000_000.text:
A battle ain't exactly the good
fortune I was hoping for!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_04_021_CUT_000_000.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_04_021_CUT_000_000.text:
Yeah, no. I got a real bad
feeling about all this.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_05_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_05_000_CUT_000_000.text: Is this some sort of research center?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_05_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_05_000_CUT_000_010.text:
It sure is! How was an alien like
yourself able to discern that?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_05_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_05_000_CUT_000_020.text:
It feels strangely reminiscent of
my old university research center
from back home.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_05_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_05_000_CUT_000_030.text:
University...? Ah! An educational institution
established for the purposes of both advanced
instruction and cutting-edge research! It is an impressive system that effectively
brings elite research directly to top-tier
students... Also ultimate frisbee?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_05_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_05_000_CUT_000_040.text:
It's almost like you're an alum!
Do you run this institute?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_05_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_05_000_CUT_000_050.text:
Close! I am Advanced Office-work Model B888888,
dispatched by the Administrative Division to
handle the organizational duties of Yellow
Division's current overseer. Oh, and everybody here calls me 'Bean.'
Hilarious, right!?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_05_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_05_000_CUT_000_060.text:
So here's the thing, alien: I've been ordered
to bring you to the overseer the moment you
arrive, but...I don't really want to.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_05_000_CUT_000_070.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_05_000_CUT_000_070.text:
So that means...what? You're refusing?
Or are you going to do it anyway but
just scowl the whole time?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_05_000_CUT_000_080.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_05_000_CUT_000_080.text:
The latter, I'm afraid; I have to prioritize
orders without regard for my own feelings,
so we're off to see the overseer. But before we go, let me fill you
in on a little something first:

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_05_000_CUT_000_090.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_05_000_CUT_000_090.text:
Due to a recent illness, the overseer
has become excessively paranoid. And between you and me, I bet he's
going to think you've come here to
reclaim the cultural artifacts taken
from your world by Yellow Division.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_05_000_CUT_000_100.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_05_000_CUT_000_100.text:
Oh, I couldn't care less about that.
We came here to find a triangle,
and that's it.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_05_000_CUT_000_110.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_05_000_CUT_000_110.text:
Really? That's great! But I am also hurt to hear
you 'couldn't care less' about our collection.
Please do be more careful about how you frame
such things in the overseer's presence, 'kay?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_05_003_CUT_000_000.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_05_003_CUT_000_000.text:
Ah, one of the aliens at last!
From which world do you hail?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_05_003_CUT_000_020.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_05_003_CUT_000_020.text: Capitol City...? Ah! Then you've come to reclaim the sword. It is a fabled treasure recovered from the depths of the sea—an artifact your people lacked the technology to raise. Why, without Yellow Division, you'd have no idea it even existed!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_05_003_CUT_000_030.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_05_003_CUT_000_030.text:
It's said that precious swords choose their
wielders, not the other way around—so as
far as I'm concerned, that blade is exactly
where it should be.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_05_003_CUT_000_040.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_05_003_CUT_000_040.text:
I am pleased you understand. But to come
all the way from Capitol City and leave
without beholding the sword would be
a fate far too cruel for words!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_05_003_CUT_000_050.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_05_003_CUT_000_050.text:
Bean, you will permit this alien to
view the sword—under the strictest
of supervision, of course.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_05_004_CUT_000_000.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_05_004_CUT_000_000.text:
Your response sure made the overseer happy,
alien—I haven't seen him look so satisfied
in quite a long time. In fact, he's been nothing but ill-tempered
lately, much to the sorrow of everyone in
Yellow Division.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_05_004_CUT_000_010.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_05_004_CUT_000_010.text:
Anyway, I need to make a follow-up report
to the overseer, so please go view the
sword in question regardless of your
actual level of interest in the matter.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_05_004_CUT_000_020.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_05_004_CUT_000_020.text:
To be honest, I had no idea what he was
even talking about. I mean...a sword?
We're more gun people.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_05_004_CUT_000_030.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_05_004_CUT_000_030.text:
Yeah, that tracks. Anyhoo, the viewing
is just for appearances, so follow me.
We'll take the lift to the lower floor.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_05_010_CUT_000_000.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_05_010_CUT_000_000.text:
Your special sword is just a pile of pieces.
Was it that way to begin with, or did you
destroy it for some kind of research?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_05_010_CUT_000_010.speaker: YellowTribe_FellowC
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_05_010_CUT_000_010.text:
I assure you that this is not our doing;
the sword was originally created to separate
in this fashion, and for now it must remain
in this disassembled state.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_05_010_CUT_000_020.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_05_010_CUT_000_020.text:
He's right! The moment you appeared here,
alien, this sword started to vibrate.
These vibrations triggered a dimensional
resonance that caused energy forms to appear.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_05_010_CUT_000_030.speaker: YellowTribe_FellowC
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_05_010_CUT_000_030.text:
By which Bean means monsters. Yet by separating
the sword's pieces, we can lessen its resonance
and weaken the energy forms it spawns—making
the monsters smaller, in other words. And that's why we're keeping the thing in
pieces while we investigate the source.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_05_010_CUT_000_040.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_05_010_CUT_000_040.text:
So our coming here triggered something
in the sword? I guess that explains why
your overseer was in such a tizzy about it.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_05_010_CUT_000_050.speaker: YellowTribe_FellowC
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_05_010_CUT_000_050.text:
When disassembled, a pattern resembling words
appears on the surface of the blade. We believe
this has some sort of supernatural or ceremonial
significance, but that's still being investigated.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_05_010_CUT_000_060.speaker: YellowTribe_FellowC
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_05_010_CUT_000_060.text:
...Oh dear. It seems an energy form has
found us. Bean, could you do something?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_05_010_CUT_000_070.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_05_010_CUT_000_070.text:
We'll handle it; maybe it'll help clarify
our supposed connection to your sword.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_05_020_CUT_000_000.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_05_020_CUT_000_000.text:
So what did this sword used to look like,
anyway? I can't quite manage to put it
together in my head.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_05_020_CUT_000_010.speaker: YellowTribe_FellowD
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_05_020_CUT_000_010.text: Sadly, that's not exactly an easy thing to describe. Based solely on its appearance, one would hardly surmise it was a weapon at all. However, one could definitely sense a sort of power contained within it.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_05_020_CUT_000_020.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_05_020_CUT_000_020.text:
But it came from the ocean, right?
Was it all rusty and degraded?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_05_020_CUT_000_030.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_05_020_CUT_000_030.text: Oh, nothing of the sort! See, the technology here in Delta Base let us restore it to a flawless state. Er, although we did lose possession of it for a bit after that...

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_05_020_CUT_000_040.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_05_020_CUT_000_040.text:
But we haven't performed any sort of in-depth
study since it was returned to us. Honestly,
the only reason we're even looking at the
thing now is because you showed up.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_05_020_CUT_000_050.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_05_020_CUT_000_050.text:
I don't see why you're so convinced this has
anything to do with us. Maybe you could find
some evidence before you start jumping to
wild conclusions?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_05_020_CUT_000_060.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_05_020_CUT_000_060.text:
Hey, I getcha! You're right,
it's entirely possible this is
unrelated to your being here.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_05_020_CUT_000_070.speaker: YellowTribe_FellowD
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_05_020_CUT_000_070.text:
Say, uh, Bean? I think we're about to
have another energy form on our hands.
Can you take care of it, please?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_05_030_CUT_000_000.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_05_030_CUT_000_000.text:
Did you make any headway on
deciphering that inscription?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_05_030_CUT_000_010.speaker: YellowTribe_FellowE
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_05_030_CUT_000_010.text:
It clearly indicates that something will happen
when the sword is reassembled, but the risk of
doing so is too great until we find a way to
stop the vibration.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_05_030_CUT_000_020.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_05_030_CUT_000_020.text: Got any ideas on that front?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_05_030_CUT_000_030.speaker: YellowTribe_FellowE
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_05_030_CUT_000_030.text:
We're attempting to negate the vibration by
reversing the characters of the inscription,
but we haven't been able to focus on the task
with all the energy forms running about.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_05_030_CUT_000_040.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_05_030_CUT_000_040.text:
Oh, no worries!
We can handle that.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_05_030_CUT_000_050.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_05_030_CUT_000_050.text:
Somehow I suspect that 'we'
means Bonnie and I.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_05_016_CUT_000_000.speaker: YellowTribe_FellowE
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_05_016_CUT_000_000.text:
It appears that if we create a replica with
the inscription reversed, it will conversely
absorb the vibrations—which will let us safely
continue our research on the upper level.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_05_016_CUT_000_010.speaker: YellowTribe_FellowE
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_05_016_CUT_000_010.text:
I will let you handle
the rest, Bean.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_05_026_CUT_000_000.speaker: YellowTribe_FellowD
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_05_026_CUT_000_000.text:
When the energy forms disappear, their energy
flows back into the sword—which means the
sword itself may be a kind of generator. We need to study it further once
we have the other pieces.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_05_026_CUT_000_010.speaker: YellowTribe_FellowD
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_05_026_CUT_000_010.text:
Can you take care of that
for us, please?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_05_036_CUT_000_000.speaker: YellowTribe_FellowE
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_05_036_CUT_000_000.text:
So this sword isn't actually a weapon.
While it may have been used as one,
that was never its intended function. But as to what its proper function
actually is, we don't yet know.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_05_036_CUT_000_010.speaker: YellowTribe_FellowC
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_05_036_CUT_000_010.text:
Regardless, this sounds like a fruitful
avenue of study, don't you think?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_05_036_CUT_000_030.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_05_036_CUT_000_030.text:
These pieces should allow us to reassemble
the sword. We can then show it to the alien
in accordance with the overseer's orders.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_05_036_CUT_000_060.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_05_036_CUT_000_060.text:
I appreciate your patience, alien!
Don't worry, we'll have this thing
patched back together in no time.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_05_036_CUT_000_070.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_05_036_CUT_000_070.text:
Aw, don't be like that! Just take a
look once it's put back together.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_05_090_CUT_000_000.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_05_090_CUT_000_000.text:
We finished restoring the sword, alien!
Come take a look!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_05_090_CUT_000_020.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_05_090_CUT_000_020.text:
Oh, I'm sure you of all people remember
what it's supposed to look like, right? That's why I'm taking you to the artifact-
restoration workshop so you can experience
the restoration duties of a Yellow Division
member firsthand!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_05_090_CUT_000_050.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_05_090_CUT_000_050.text:
Splendid work! And with this, I can officially
say that I've followed the overseer's order
to show you the sword.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_05_090_CUT_000_060.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_05_090_CUT_000_060.text:
Oh, and there's MORE good news! The repair of
the sword seems to have made the overseer feel
better; he intends to return to work and
study the sword's true purpose personally!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_05_090_CUT_000_080.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_05_090_CUT_000_080.text:
Hey, so you also seem to have something of an
interest in the sword's true nature, right?
If so, you should join us in our research!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_05_090_CUT_000_090.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_05_090_CUT_000_090.text: Sure, if the mood strikes me.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_05_090_CUT_000_110.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_05_090_CUT_000_110.text:
There's a piece of the sword left over?
But it all fit together perfectly!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_05_090_CUT_000_120.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_05_090_CUT_000_120.text: Guess I'll keep this as a souvenir.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_05_090_CUT_000_130.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_05_090_CUT_000_130.text:
Ack! No! I don't know if I'll be able
to put it back together again!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Hi. Can you tell me what goes on
in this part of the base?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_010.text:
I guess it couldn't hear me.
HELLO THERE, FRIEND!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_020.text: Hm. This robot must be broken.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_040.text:
Fully functional, thank you! However, I have been ordered to ignore the
aliens—of which you are one—and would appreciate
you not interfering with that, especially since
you are FAR more assertive than I expected.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_050.text: Wait, who ordered you to ignore me?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_060.text:
The Yellow Division overseer ordered the
entire division not to engage with the aliens—
and as his administrative surrogate, I had
no choice but to follow said order. Oh, and please don't ask me why he issued that
order, because I have ZERO idea. Frankly, I feel
like chatting with you is a wonderful opportunity
for cultural exchange!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_070.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_070.text:
If I'm to be ignored, I at least want to know
why. Where's your overseer now?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_080.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_080.text: Oh, I'm afraid the overseer has been in poor health for quite some time and is currently being treated in the medical facility. And while visitors aren't expressly forbidden, it won't be easy to get in.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_100.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_100.text:
Ack! I didn't expect them to pursue
him right into the hospital!
