SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_110.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_110.text:
I hear the Yellow Division overseer
is around here somewhere?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_120.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_120.text:
The Yellow Division overseer is I, alien!
Now why have you come!?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_130.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_130.text:
You ordered your entire division to
ignore us, and I want to know why.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_140.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_140.text:
You visiting aliens have put the entirety
of Delta Base in danger—which is why
I want you to complete your objective
and leave as quickly as possible. And as far as Yellow Division saw it,
ignoring you seemed like the best way
to achieve that outcome.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_150.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_150.text:
Once we find our triangle, we'll be out of
your hair—but if you're so determined to
be rid of us, you could loan us that helper
mech to expedite our search.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_160.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_160.text:
Did you hear that, mech? You're to help us
find our triangle, and I thank you in advance
for your cooperation. Now what do we call you?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_170.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_170.text:
I am B888888, but the members of Yellow
Division refer to me as 'Bean.'
Also, I never imagined you'd be so pushy
about all of this! Sheesh!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_180.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_180.text:
Bean, we're looking for a triangle.
Seen anything like that lately?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_190.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_190.text:
Well, I guess there are strange triangles in
the base's lower level, though I have no idea 
if they're the kind you're looking for or not. Anyhoo, let's take the Yellow Division
lift down there and I'll show you.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_06_010_CUT_000_000.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_06_010_CUT_000_000.text:
Behold the spriggans! These infuriating
creatures enjoy nothing more than nibbling
on Yellow Division's precious-minerals
collection, which is a real pain. Also, the thing it's chewing on right now
just might be the triangle you seek!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_06_010_CUT_000_010.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_06_010_CUT_000_010.text:
Say, that DOES look triangular!
We need to get it!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_06_010_CUT_000_020.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_06_010_CUT_000_020.text: Well, don't let me stop you!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_06_011_CUT_000_000.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_06_011_CUT_000_000.text:
Those aren't spriggans, and they won't
have anything to do with your triangle.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_06_011_CUT_000_020.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_06_011_CUT_000_020.text:
Oh, let's just call it a hunch!
You'd be better off ignoring 'em.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_06_020_CUT_000_010.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_06_020_CUT_000_010.text: No, it was just some gemstone.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_06_020_CUT_000_020.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_06_020_CUT_000_020.text:
Oh? That's a drag. But you've still done
us a great service by getting rid of those
awful spriggans! Now let's gather up the
gem fragments they dropped.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_06_020_CUT_000_030.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_06_020_CUT_000_030.text:
Aw, don't look so glum.
There'll be other chances!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_06_030_CUT_000_000.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_06_030_CUT_000_000.text:
There's another one of those spriggans—
and it's chewing on something!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_06_030_CUT_000_020.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_06_030_CUT_000_020.text:
I'll get that out of its mouth
one way or the other!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_06_040_CUT_000_020.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_06_040_CUT_000_020.text:
Well, how about that... But don't lose hope,
because there are still plenty more around!
Oh, but let's make sure to gather up these
gem fragments before we go find 'em, okay?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_06_050_CUT_000_000.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_06_050_CUT_000_000.text:
Oh, look. Another spriggan
is eating a gem.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_06_050_CUT_000_020.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_06_050_CUT_000_020.text:
Or not. These things clearly eat gems;
I don't think triangles are on the menu.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_06_050_CUT_000_030.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_06_050_CUT_000_030.text:
Are you suuure? I mean, maybe you should
get a closer look at what's in its mouth just
to be super certain!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_06_050_CUT_000_040.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_06_050_CUT_000_040.text:
I almost wonder if a certain administrative robot
is manipulating us into fighting spriggans in order
to protect his division's collection of gems.
What do you think of that theory, Bean?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_06_050_CUT_000_050.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_06_050_CUT_000_050.text:
WHAAAAAAT!? I'm shocked! Shocked, I tell you!
Why, that couldn't be further from the truth!
All I'm doing here, alien, is trying to help
YOU find your triangle! Also, that isn't just a 'gem' that thing
is eating—it's a valuable specimen
known as the philosopher's stone.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_06_050_CUT_000_060.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_06_050_CUT_000_060.text:
Is 'philosopher's stone' a Delta Base
word for a triangle?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_06_050_CUT_000_080.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_06_050_CUT_000_080.text:
And yet just a moment ago your only
concern was that it might be eating
the triangle we're after. Bean, why didn't you just ask us to help
protect your gems in the first place?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_06_050_CUT_000_090.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_06_050_CUT_000_090.text:
Okay, fine! I admit it!
You're right about everything! The overseer wanted me to ignore you, but you
made me join your triangle search—and I figured
the only way I could satisfy both was to get you 
to fight spriggans for me. So, um, sorry.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_06_050_CUT_000_100.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_06_050_CUT_000_100.text:
I appreciate that you're in a tough situation,
so we'll help you deal with your spriggans
and not inform the overseer. But in exchange, you need to help us
find a triangle for REAL. Got it?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_06_050_CUT_000_110.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_06_050_CUT_000_110.text:
I'm truly moved by your forgiveness,
alien, and refuse to believe your
presence here could possibly pose
any threat to Delta Base!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_06_050_CUT_000_120.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_06_050_CUT_000_120.text:
Thanks for believing in us, Bean.
Now we have a spriggan to fight.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_06_060_CUT_000_000.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_06_060_CUT_000_000.text:
Oh, goodie! Thanks to you, we recovered
the pieces of some very precious stones!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_06_060_CUT_000_020.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_06_060_CUT_000_020.text:
But your philosopher's stone is in pieces.
Can you still use it?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_06_060_CUT_000_050.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_06_060_CUT_000_050.text:
If you put all the pieces in the
correct place, the stone returns
to how it used to be! Yes, the philosopher's stone has some real magic,
all right. Er, but they don't snap together
by themselves, so you have to do it manually.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_06_060_CUT_000_070.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_06_060_CUT_000_070.text:
Whoa! I never imagined an alien like you would
possess such capabilities! Why, this could lead
to significant advances in our understanding of
the philosopher's stone, so thanks for that!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_06_060_CUT_000_080.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_06_060_CUT_000_080.text: I give up. This is too hard!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_06_060_CUT_000_090.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_06_060_CUT_000_090.text:
If it's so difficult that even a Bean
Model-8 like myself struggles to put
it back together, it's no surprise
that you couldn't do it!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_06_060_CUT_000_100.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_06_060_CUT_000_100.text:
I'll bring the philosopher's stone back,
and then we can get to work on
your spirit thing.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_06_060_CUT_000_120.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_06_060_CUT_000_120.text: How can there be a piece left over?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_06_060_CUT_000_130.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_06_060_CUT_000_130.text:
This seems to be an extra piece of the
philosopher's stone. Well, if Bean doesn't
need it, I'll give it a good home.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_06_060_CUT_000_140.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_06_060_CUT_000_140.text:
I'll bring the pieces of the philosopher's
stone back, and then we can get to work
on your triangle thing.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_06_120_CUT_000_000.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_06_120_CUT_000_000.text:
Good news, aliens! I reported our latest
adventures to the overseer and handed
over the philosopher's stone you fixed. I thought for sure he'd be mad at me,
but he actually praised me instead! It seems
his whole 'ignore the aliens' order has been
completely forgotten.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_06_120_CUT_000_010.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_06_120_CUT_000_010.text:
This philosopher's stone must
be really important to him.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_06_120_CUT_000_020.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_06_120_CUT_000_020.text:
Regardless, it is no longer necessary
for you to quickly conclude your
business and leave Delta Base.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_06_120_CUT_000_030.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_06_120_CUT_000_030.text:
Oh, but there was a piece of bad news at the
end: The overseer ordered me to start prepping
the next experiment, so our triangle search
will have to wait until that's finished.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_06_120_CUT_000_040.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_06_120_CUT_000_040.text:
That's fine. It will give us a little
more time to explore Delta Base.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_000.text:
I bring good tidings, alien! The overseer's
health has improved, and he'll officially
be resuming his duties today!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_010.text:
Are you sure you're up to this, sir?
You could jeopardize your recovery
if you push yourself too hard.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_020.text:
While I admit I'm pushing myself somewhat,
the mental anguish from staying cooped up
in that medical facility would be far worse
for me in the long run. Now then, Bean. Isn't there an
additional piece of news to share?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_030.text:
Indeed there is! We've had a breakthrough
in our research into the cursed tomes,
and now know it's connected to our
Orichalcum Skeletal Specimen!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_040.text:
The Orichalcum Skeletal Specimen is an
anatomical model made of a rare metal
called orichalcum. Please note that while we believe the
skeleton to be man-made, it is not a
human skeleton, and therefore does not
resemble either you or the overseer.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_050.text:
The skeleton contains means of
both locomotion and communication. As such, it is likely modeled after an
exoskeletal life-form, with an appearance
indicative of the beings that inhabit
the world on which it was created.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_060.text:
I don't have much of a background in
this sort of thing, so I'm afraid most of
that went in one ear and out the other. Also, I don't really understand how
it's connected to the cursed tomes.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_070.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_070.text:
Oh, right! See, when I read through the
ancient tomes to verify their contents,
I wasn't cursed in the same way the
fleshy researchers were. Instead, the transformative functions of
the tome activated my internal mechanisms!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_080.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_080.text:
You don't look any different to me.
What exactly was activated?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_090.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_090.text:
Whaaat? You can't even tell that
my processing speed has tripled!? No, that's a joke. I was already
fully activated, so there was no
visible effect.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_100.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_100.text: But it did give us the idea of using the tome's curse on the Orichalcum Skeletal Specimen! And upon further investigation, we found numerous commonalities that suggest the specimen and cursed tomes are connected.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_110.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_110.text:
In summation, we believe the curse
in the ancient tomes is, in fact,
an activation command for the
Orichalcum Skeletal Specimen!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_120.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_120.text:
That sounds like an incredible discovery.
I know how passionate everyone in Yellow
Division is about research, and I see that
dedication is about to pay off.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_130.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_130.text:
Oh, but our research doesn't end with
this revelation, alien! We intend to
use the curse to attempt to activate
the Orichalcum Skeletal Specimen.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_150.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_150.text:
Only one way to find out! Because whether it
works or not, the important thing is that
we try. Isn't that right, Overseer?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_160.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_160.text:
Exactly so, Bean. I appreciate how you
have a wonderful way of saying things
I often struggle to express. Now then, alien. If you are ready,
I would very much like you to witness
our grand experiment.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_180.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_180.text: Can you give me a little time?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_190.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_190.text:
All necessary preparations
have been made.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_000.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_000.text: Alien! We must speak of the sword.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_010.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_010.text:
Hey there, Mr. Overseer.
How you feeling?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_020.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_020.text:
My physical condition is irrelevant!
All that matters is that the sword is
innately connected to the Orichalcum
Skeletal Specimen! Now tell me everything you know about
the specimen, and do not lie!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_030.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_030.text:
Yeah, so I don't know what that is—
and to be honest, I don't know what
that sword was, either. Melee weapons
have little value where I'm from.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_040.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_040.text:
The Orichalcum Skeletal Specimen is a
skeleton created from a rare metal
called orichalcum.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_050.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_050.text:
It contains means of both locomotion and
communication, and we believe it to be an
anatomical model of an exoskeletal life-form.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_060.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_060.text:
Don't play dumb with me, alien!
I know you really came here to recover
the Orichalcum Skeletal Specimen! But as I'm about to prove, we have already
solved its mystery—and we have no intention
of returning it to you!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_090.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_090.text:
It's okay, Bean—this isn't your fault.
I just don't want anything to do with
Yellow Division anymore.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_100.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_100.text:
No! Please don't say that!
Just come observe this one experiment!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_110.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_110.text:
So your overseer can throw more bizarre
accusations my way? No thanks.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_120.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_120.text:
But if something goes wrong with the experiment,
Yellow Division will need help dealing with it—
and the overseer is too proud to seek aid from
the Administrative or any other division!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_130.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_130.text:
But you're from the Administrative
Division, and you're helping him.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_140.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_140.text:
Sure, but I'm sort of a special case because
I was involved with reassembling the sword.
Please help me here! I'm begging you!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_160.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_160.text: Mmm, let me think about it.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_170.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_170.text: I appreciate you even considering it.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_180.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_180.text:
Please help me out here, alien!
I'm begging you!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_07_020_CUT_000_000.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_07_020_CUT_000_000.text:
A moment, alien! I heard what happened with
the philosopher's stone. Your hard work was very
much appreciated, and I apologize for suggesting
you might bring misfortune to Delta Base.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_07_020_CUT_000_010.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_07_020_CUT_000_010.text:
No apology necessary. I take it that
philosopher's stone was very important
to Yellow Division?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_07_020_CUT_000_020.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_07_020_CUT_000_020.text:
As I gazed upon the restored stone,
I suddenly recalled the Orichalcum 
Skeletal Specimen whose study we had
neglected for so many years. I was struck with an intuitive sense 
that this was the key to its mystery!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_07_020_CUT_000_030.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_07_020_CUT_000_030.text:
Sorry, what specimen are
we talking about here?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_07_020_CUT_000_040.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_07_020_CUT_000_040.text:
The Orichalcum Skeletal Specimen is an
anatomical model made of a rare metal
called orichalcum. Please note that while we believe the
skeleton to be man-made, it is not a
human skeleton, and therefore does not
resemble either you or the overseer.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_07_020_CUT_000_050.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_07_020_CUT_000_050.text:
The skeleton contains means of both
locomotion and communication. As such, it is likely modeled after an
exoskeletal life-form, with an appearance
indicative of the beings that inhabit
the world on which it was created.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_07_020_CUT_000_060.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_07_020_CUT_000_060.text:
I believe we can use the power of the
philosopher's stone to set the skeletal
model in motion, giving us valuable clues
into the civilization that created it. Oh, but I could not be more
excited about the prospect!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_07_020_CUT_000_070.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_07_020_CUT_000_070.text:
The experiment's all ready to go, alien,
so we're hoping you might do us the
honor of observing it with us?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_000.text:
You know, I'm no expert, but this
skeletal specimen sure looks mechanical.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_010.text:
It DOES, doesn't it!? But that strong
mechanical appearance is an aspect our
cultural researchers had to shed their
preconceived assumptions about. See, because whoever made the specimen
clearly felt it was skeletal in nature,
not mechanical.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_020.text:
Now let us begin the activation of
the Orichalcum Skeletal Specimen! I will read from the cursed tome.
That way, should anything go wrong,
the sacrifice will be mine alone.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_030.text:
For when I said I had recovered, that was
a lie. One way or the other, this will be
my final duty for Yellow Division.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_060.text:
The curse... I can feel it...
Agh! Such...pain! But I must continue! Before long, 
the transformation...should...begin...

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_080.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_080.text:
The overseer collapsed! Bean,
you have to stop the experiment!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_100.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_100.text: Oh wow! That was the overseer!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_120.speaker: Orichalcum_Body
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_120.text:
Ah, of course! I am now inside
the Orichalcum Skeletal Specimen! As I suspected, the curse was never a curse
at all, but merely a way for the people of
that world to transfer themselves into a
new exoskeleton.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_130.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_130.text:
Nice job, Overseer. The experiment was a
success! Now please share your observations
with us so we can take notes.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_140.speaker: Orichalcum_Body
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_140.text:
I am gradually beginning to understand how
this skeleton works. At the brink of death,
I have been freed from my withered, useless
body and awakened inside a new one.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_150.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_150.text:
You're blowing my mind here, Overseer!
I mean, with that new skeleton, you might
be able to live on forever!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_160.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_160.text:
I'm not sure that's something
we should be celebrating.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_170.speaker: Orichalcum_Body
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_170.text:
Hmm? Who are you? What are
all of you doing in...?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_180.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_180.text:
Overseer? What's happening?
Who are you talking to?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_190.speaker: Orichalcum_Body
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_190.text:
No... No! I'm not alone in this body!
There are hundreds—no, thousands
of others...

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_210.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_210.text:
Uh-oh. The Orichalcum Skeletal Specimen
is attempting to access Delta Base's
information networks.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_220.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_220.text:
Has the Overseer taken over the skeleton,
or did it take over him!?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_230.speaker: Orichalcum_Body
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_230.text:
Cannot defy the majority...
Cut us off... Protect... Delta...

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_240.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_240.text: Bean, we have to do something! Bean!?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_250.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_250.text:
I am acting as fast as my
processors allow, alien!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_260.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_260.text:
The specimen intends to use the overseer's
knowledge to take over Delta Base. You must
physically cut Yellow Division off from the
network in order to protect it. I will attempt to interfere with the
specimen's communications systems
in order to buy you time.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_270.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_270.text:
I'll work as fast as I can,
alien, but please hurry!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_280.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_280.text: Will do! You handle things here, Bean!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_010_CUT_000_000.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_010_CUT_000_000.text:
For so many years, the Orichalcum Skeletal
Specimen has stood as a great mystery even
within Yellow Division's varied collection. But now, its connection to the reassembled
sword is clear: we can expect that the
interdimensional energy pulses released by
the blade will activate its skeletal frame.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_010_CUT_000_010.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_010_CUT_000_010.text:
Now, let us begin the experiment.
Bean, do not forget to document
everything. And...begin resonating!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_010_CUT_000_020.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_010_CUT_000_020.text:
Yes, it is exactly as predicted...
As the sword and I resonate together,
so too does the skeletal frame. This sword is the key that bonds
the skeleton to its wielder.
Increase the resonance!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_010_CUT_000_040.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_010_CUT_000_040.text:
The overseer collapsed! Bean,
you have to stop the experiment!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_010_CUT_000_060.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_010_CUT_000_060.text:
Uh-oh. That voice is coming from the
Orichalcum Skeletal Specimen, but it
sounds like the overseer!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_010_CUT_000_070.speaker: Orichalcum_Body
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_010_CUT_000_070.text:
Correct, Bean. I am now within the specimen.
Or perhaps it would be more accurate to say
that the specimen is now I? Behold, alien! I have achieved the full
integration with the Orichalcum Skeletal
Specimen which you could not!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_010_CUT_000_080.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_010_CUT_000_080.text:
How many times do I have to tell you I don't
give a damn about your weird skeleton!?
I only care what you plan to do with it.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_010_CUT_000_090.speaker: Orichalcum_Body
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_010_CUT_000_090.text:
I'm going to infiltrate the core systems
of Delta Base and take control of all of its
functions! Such a feat will be a simple task
inside my new body.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_010_CUT_000_100.speaker: Orichalcum_Body
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_010_CUT_000_100.text:
Once I am in full command of Delta Base,
I will begin my advance into all the other
worlds, thereby bringing their civilizations
under my control as well!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_010_CUT_000_110.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_010_CUT_000_110.text:
Well, he's clearly lost his mind.
What's the plan now, Bean?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_010_CUT_000_130.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_010_CUT_000_130.text:
Sorry! I'm currently in the process of
diverting all the skeleton's connection
requests through me in hopes of slowing
his access to Delta Base's systems!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_010_CUT_000_140.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_010_CUT_000_140.text:
Then I guess I should do what I
can to stop him in the meantime.
Good luck on your end, Bean!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_020_CUT_000_000.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_020_CUT_000_000.text:
This is the skeletal specimen? Like you said,
this thing appears more closely related to
a crab or spider than a human.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_020_CUT_000_010.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_020_CUT_000_010.text:
Yeah, I'd love to know what sort of civilization
these people created—and I bet reactivating this
skeleton will tell us all about it! The overseer
is a genius for thinking up this plan!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_020_CUT_000_020.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_020_CUT_000_020.text:
Thank you, Bean. And now that I have the
philosopher's stone, let us begin our activation
of the Orichalcum Skeletal Specimen.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_020_CUT_000_030.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_020_CUT_000_030.text:
It was a wise choice to build the frame
out of orichalcum. It is extremely durable,
yet adaptable enough to meet the needs
of multiple civilizations. However...

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_020_CUT_000_050.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_020_CUT_000_050.text:
He's talking like HE was the
one who built the skeleton.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_020_CUT_000_060.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_020_CUT_000_060.text:
We didn't have the energy source to power
the orichalcum frame, and so were only
able to operate it briefly. Now that we have the philosopher's stone,
however, its power should ensure a
sufficient duration of operability.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_020_CUT_000_080.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_020_CUT_000_080.text:
The Orichalcum Skeletal Specimen
is now online.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_020_CUT_000_090.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_020_CUT_000_090.text: The overseer's been pulled into it!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_020_CUT_000_100.speaker: Orichalcum_Body
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_020_CUT_000_100.text:
Analyzing all information... Overseer...
Yellow Division... Delta Base...
Organizational structure... Analysis complete. Placing Delta Base
under our authority.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_020_CUT_000_110.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_020_CUT_000_110.text:
Uh-oh! The Orichalcum Skeletal Specimen is
attempting to access Delta Base's information
network! Attempting to cut off accyrk•#

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_020_CUT_000_120.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_020_CUT_000_120.text:
Infiltrat*t5 Delta $9wBase netwo4u@%*8$ym.
Please physically sever Yellow Divisio*5n
from netw0r# to protect Delta Ba3&^j.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_020_CUT_000_130.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_020_CUT_000_130.text: I'll do what I can, Bean!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_050_CUT_000_000.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_050_CUT_000_000.text:
So all I need to do is cut the power
to this control panel?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_050_CUT_000_010.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_050_CUT_000_010.text:
Still two more connections to sever.
Delta Base suddenly feels like an
awfully large place...

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_050_CUT_000_020.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_050_CUT_000_020.text:
Only one more connection to sever.
I hope I'm not too late!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_050_CUT_000_030.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_050_CUT_000_030.text:
Okay, that should keep the skeleton
from taking control of Delta Base.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_050_CUT_000_040.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_050_CUT_000_040.text:
I hope Bean's okay.
I better hurry back.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_080_CUT_000_000.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_080_CUT_000_000.text:
You okay, Bean!? Yellow Division should
be cut off from the rest of the base now!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_080_CUT_000_010.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_080_CUT_000_010.text:
Confirming isolationlationlationlation...
Orichalcum Skeletal Specimen sevevevevered...
...Hmm? My processessessing speed appears to
be dropping. Initiating reboooooot...

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_080_CUT_000_020.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_080_CUT_000_020.text:
Bean, what do we do about the skeleton?
...Bean!? Oh, of all the times to reboot!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_080_CUT_000_030.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_080_CUT_000_030.text:
I can't wait until he's back online.
I need to destroy it now!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_082_CUT_000_010.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_082_CUT_000_010.text:
&j823 network #2uf&& secured.
Plea$3se stop ^4r6 Orich*1hym
Sk3#4tal Specim*n.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_082_CUT_000_020.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_082_CUT_000_020.text: You want ME to stop him!? But how!?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_030_CUT_000_000.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_030_CUT_000_000.text:
If we lifted the curse, the transformation
should reverse and return the overseer
to his former body.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_030_CUT_000_010.speaker: Orichalcum_Body
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_030_CUT_000_010.text:
Alas, that does not appear to be the case.
That curse truly was a curse—or perhaps it
was a punishment. This body is a prison. I will be
captive here forever, with no hope
of escape or death.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_030_CUT_000_020.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_030_CUT_000_020.text:
You haven't done anything to deserve
that sort of punishment; there must be
some way to get you out of there.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_030_CUT_000_030.speaker: Orichalcum_Body
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_030_CUT_000_030.text:
Thank you for saying so, alien. However,
I am now able to visualize the culture that
felt it necessary to create such a prison. Once I am able to communicate with the others 
trapped in here, I look forward to continuing
my research. Therefore, I view this not as a
punishment, but as an opportunity.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_030_CUT_000_040.speaker: Orichalcum_Body
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_030_CUT_000_040.text:
The Orichalcum Skeletal Specimen will soon
shut down and enter an eternal slumber.
Thank you, alien. Farewell, Bean.
Glory to Yellow Division.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_030_CUT_000_050.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_030_CUT_000_050.text:
The Orichalcum Skeletal Specimen
is now offline.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_030_CUT_000_060.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_030_CUT_000_060.text:
Don't blame yourself for this, alien:
the die was cast the moment the overseer
transferred himself into the skeleton. In fact, you were right to put
a stop to it when you did!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_030_CUT_000_070.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_030_CUT_000_070.text:
I appreciate you for saying so, Bean,
but I can't help but wonder if there's
something more we could have done.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_030_CUT_000_080.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_030_CUT_000_080.text:
Huh? Hey, was this triangular bit here
part of the skeletal specimen?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_030_CUT_000_090.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_030_CUT_000_090.text: Heck, that's one of our triangles! It's resonatin' with the frame!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_030_CUT_000_100.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_030_CUT_000_100.text:
What, so this was ALL part of our destiny?
Curses and skeletons and overseers and triangles?
This is really how it was supposed to go?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_030_CUT_000_110.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_030_CUT_000_110.text:
Reckon that's one more part of the
triangle mystery we need to solve.
Just stay strong, darlin'!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_030_CUT_000_120.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_030_CUT_000_120.text:
I'm fine. No matter what transpires,
I'll see it through to the end.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_031_CUT_000_000.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_031_CUT_000_000.text:
Your dreams of world domination are over,
Overseer, so how about you return to your
original body now?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_031_CUT_000_010.speaker: Orichalcum_Body
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_031_CUT_000_010.text:
Vile alien! I will never permit the
Orichalcum Skeletal Specimen to fall
into your treacherous hands!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_031_CUT_000_020.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_031_CUT_000_020.text:
I can't believe he'd go so far as to
self-destruct! What was it about us
that he hated so much?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_031_CUT_000_030.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_031_CUT_000_030.text:
Don't blame yourself, alien.
That sort of paranoia has always been
part of the overseer's general nature. Between his sickness and his advanced age,
I'm guessing he just couldn't hold it
back anymore.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_031_CUT_000_040.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_031_CUT_000_040.text:
Plus, who knows what effect the
sword and skeleton had on him?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_031_CUT_000_050.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_031_CUT_000_050.text:
You think they may have had some
kind of psychological effect on him?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_031_CUT_000_060.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_031_CUT_000_060.text:
I think it's a strong possibility, sure.
But I'd like to reassemble both artifacts
to investigate them further.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_031_CUT_000_070.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_031_CUT_000_070.text:
That sounds like a long
and tedious process.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_031_CUT_000_080.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_031_CUT_000_080.text:
Oh, it's a trivial matter for the researchers
of Yellow Division. In fact, that's just the
sort of thing they live for!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_031_CUT_000_110.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_031_CUT_000_110.text:
I still don't understand what the overseer
was trying to say, but it appears this event
really did involve us.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_031_CUT_000_120.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_031_CUT_000_120.text:
Eh, I doubt the overseer really understood
what was happening here either. But hey,
congratulations on finding your triangle!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_031_CUT_000_130.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_031_CUT_000_130.text:
Thanks, Bean. We couldn't have
done it without you.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_032_CUT_000_000.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_032_CUT_000_000.text:
Everything about this felt wrong from the
moment the overseer's attitude changed. ...Overseer? Can you still
hear us from in there?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_032_CUT_000_010.speaker: Orichalcum_Body
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_032_CUT_000_010.text:
I was ensnared by the power
of the philosopher's stone and
set these events in motion. To everyone in Yellow Division, I am
deeply sorry. My behavior has been a
disgrace to all of Delta Base.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_032_CUT_000_020.speaker: Orichalcum_Body
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_032_CUT_000_020.text:
And yet, aliens, this all came to pass because
of your presence. Had you not come here,
I never would have touched the stone.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_032_CUT_000_030.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_032_CUT_000_030.text: Forgive me for saying so, Overseer, but this all would have happened eventually even without the aliens! In fact, their being here saved us all from a much greater disaster!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_032_CUT_000_040.speaker: Orichalcum_Body
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_032_CUT_000_040.text:
Heed me, all members of Yellow Division!
You are to have nothing to do with the aliens!
That is my final order.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_032_CUT_000_050.speaker: Orichalcum_Body
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_032_CUT_000_050.text:
The philosopher's stone is running out
of energy... Ah, but this is a surprise...
I expected it to last longer...

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_032_CUT_000_060.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_032_CUT_000_060.text:
The Orichalcum Skeletal Specimen
has gone offline.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_032_CUT_000_070.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_032_CUT_000_070.text:
And sorry, aliens, but until a new overseer
is chosen, the orders of the former one
have to remain in effect—which means
I won't be able to help you anymore.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_032_CUT_000_080.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_032_CUT_000_080.text:
That's okay, Bean. Your overseer certainly was
a stubborn man, but he wasn't wrong—our being
here really did lead to catastrophe, and I'm not
sure quite what to make of that. Honestly, at this point, I just want to
find our triangle and leave Delta Base.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_032_CUT_000_110.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_CLT_08_032_CUT_000_110.text:
So the overseer's mania somehow led
to our triangle? Perhaps we owe him
our gratitude after all.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_OLD_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_OLD_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Reckon this here's cell where the
overseer said an alien's bein' held.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_OLD_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_OLD_000_CUT_000_010.text:
Please don't tell me we're going to
open it and find a mummified corpse.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_OLD_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: Unknown_Person
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_OLD_000_CUT_000_040.text:
I'm begging you, let me out of here!
I want to go home!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_OLD_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: Vagrant
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_OLD_000_CUT_000_060.text: You... You know who I am?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_OLD_000_CUT_000_070.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_OLD_000_CUT_000_070.text:
You're that singer who up 'n' disappeared,
right? It was all over the news! Folks all said
the pressure got to you and you eloped with
a secret lover or somethin'.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_OLD_000_CUT_000_080.speaker: Emily_Bryant
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_OLD_000_CUT_000_080.text:
Eloped!? No! I was kidnapped by aliens
and taken to Area 51! I swear to you, I didn't see anything!
I don't know anything that's supposed
to be secret, so just let me go home!

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_OLD_000_CUT_000_090.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_OLD_000_CUT_000_090.text:
Easy now, darlin'. My name's Bonnie,
and this here's Formina. We're both
officers with the Capitol City P.D.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_OLD_000_CUT_000_110.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_OLD_000_CUT_000_110.text:
We got ourselves a duty to serve and protect,
so don't you worry about a thing.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_OLD_000_CUT_000_130.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_OLD_000_CUT_000_130.text:
Are we sure it's okay to
just take her with us?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_OLD_000_CUT_000_140.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_OLD_000_CUT_000_140.text:
Don't reckon the overseer would've told us
about her if that wasn't what she expected
us to do in the end.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_OLD_000_CUT_000_160.speaker: Vagrant
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_OLD_000_CUT_000_160.text: I know I said I didn't know any secrets, but... Well, this is a key to something.

SUB_W10_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_00.speaker: Connection_Operator
SUB_W10_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_00.text:
Alert! Alert! An unapproved external
connection has been made from outside
the connectivity gate.

SUB_W10_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_01.speaker: Connection_Boss
SUB_W10_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_01.text:
Impossible. No one has forced their
way through the connectivity gate
for 15,462 cycles.

SUB_W10_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_03.speaker: Connection_Boss
SUB_W10_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_03.text:
External lock disengaged.
Our commands are being overridden.

SUB_W10_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_04.speaker: Chief_Manager
SUB_W10_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_04.text:
All security teams, assemble at the
connectivity gate! Anti-alien protocols
have been initiated!

SUB_W10_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_CUT_010_00.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_CUT_010_00.text:
Looks like we're in some kinda ship.
It's definitely not any normal building,
what with these skinny passages.

SUB_W10_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_CUT_010_00.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W10_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_CUT_010_00.text:
I don't feel any rocking, though,
which means it must be massive.

SUB_W10_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_CUT_010_02.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_CUT_010_02.text:
Could be a military ship, I guess.
Oh, but all the sailors are robots!
Are we in a spaceship here?

SUB_W10_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_CUT_010_03.speaker: Base_Sheriff
SUB_W10_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_CUT_010_03.text:
Scanning. Trespasser does not match
known records of Delta Base members.
Alien status confirmed.

SUB_W10_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_CUT_010_05.speaker: Chief_Manager
SUB_W10_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_CUT_010_05.text:
The aliens will be interrogated by the
Council of Overseers. They will decide
the means of their disposal.

SUB_W10_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_CUT_010_06.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W10_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_CUT_010_06.text: Don't love the sound of that.

SUB_W10_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_00.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_00.text:
The fate of captive aliens is determined
by the Detention Division. With infiltrating
aliens, however, the Council of Overseers
has jurisdiction.

SUB_W10_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_01.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_01.text: And if we fail to reach consensus?

SUB_W10_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_02.speaker: Chief_Manager
SUB_W10_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_02.text:
If you entrust the matter to
the Administrative Division,
we will handle disposal.

SUB_W10_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_03.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_03.text:
Disposal sounds good to me—where does trash
belong but in the trash can? Then we can pretend
this unapproved external connection never
happened and all walk away happy.

SUB_W10_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_04.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_04.text:
If we simply ignore what happened,
it could easily pave the way to
our own destruction.

SUB_W10_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_05.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_05.text:
This incident also calls our own ethics into
question. How can we allow ourselves to intrude
upon other worlds if we refuse to grant the
same privilege to others?

SUB_W10_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_06.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_06.text: Oh, okay. So you two lofty overseers think it's just peachy keen to let these aliens run around harassing us? These two won't shut up about finding triangles of all things. Oh, but not any normal triangles, mind you—these are special triangles.

SUB_W10_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_07.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_07.text:
If you know that such special triangles
exist on Delta Base, aliens, I would have
you share your evidence with us.

SUB_W10_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_08.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_08.text:
Lookee here. This triangle points the way
to its little triangle friends, and that's what
brought us here. But if it ain't in the base,
maybe it's somewhere outside it?

SUB_W10_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_09.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_09.text: I'm sorry. Outside the base? Ha ha ha! Did you hear that!?

SUB_W10_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_10.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_10.text:
Delta Base has no 'outside,' alien.
The only thing connected to the exterior
is the door you came through.

SUB_W10_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_11.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_11.text:
Then that means the triangle
is in here someplace. So how about you let us poke around
a little? Once we find it, we'll get
right on up outta here.

SUB_W10_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_12.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_12.text:
Oh, suuure! We'll just let aliens wander
freely around Delta Base doing whatever
they please! I don't know where you come from,
aliens, but we have rules here!
Very important rules!

SUB_W10_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_13.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_13.text:
Would it be acceptable to assign them
a monitor? Yellow Division excels at
cross-cultural communication, yes?

SUB_W10_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_14.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_14.text:
A monitor without the capability
to fight would serve no purpose.
It should come from Red Division.

SUB_W10_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_15.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_15.text:
Sure, we can fight—but no one
actually knows the rules better
than the Administrative Division!

SUB_W10_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_16.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_16.text:
The Council of Overseers has reached its
decision. The Administrative Division will
assign a monitor to the aliens, and they
will be allowed to search for a triangle.

SUB_W10_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_17.speaker: Chief_Manager
SUB_W10_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_17.text:
Understood. As the Administrative
Division's representative, I will
assign a monitor to the aliens.

SUB_W10_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_CUT_030_00.speaker: Gold_SubManager
SUB_W10_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_CUT_030_00.text:
I'm Administrator Gold, your assigned monitor.
I ask that you complete your task quickly,
aliens, as I have little free time to spare.

SUB_W10_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_CUT_030_01.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W10_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_CUT_030_01.text:
This 'Delta Base' is like being
on the set of a sci-fi movie!

SUB_W10_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_CUT_030_02.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_CUT_030_02.text:
Sci-fi horror movie, maybe. Were you not
in the room with those creepy 'overseers'?
Let's find our triangle and get outta here.

SUB_W10_WRLD_BOFO_INTERMISSION_000_CUT_0.speaker: Gold_SubManager
SUB_W10_WRLD_BOFO_INTERMISSION_000_CUT_0.text:
The Council of Overseers has granted
you permission to search for triangles—
and that is all you are allowed to do.
Is this understood?

SUB_W10_WRLD_BOFO_INTERMISSION_000_CUT_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_WRLD_BOFO_INTERMISSION_000_CUT_0.text:
If it's got you that aggravated, then maybe
tell the folks in all them other divisions
to quit pepperin' us with weird requests!

SUB_W10_WRLD_BOFO_INTERMISSION_000_CUT_0.speaker: Gold_SubManager
SUB_W10_WRLD_BOFO_INTERMISSION_000_CUT_0.text:
The Administrative Division does not interfere
in the business of other divisions. Ours is a
support role only, and I lack the authority
to issue orders.

SUB_W10_WRLD_BOFO_INTERMISSION_010_CUT_0.speaker: Gold_SubManager
SUB_W10_WRLD_BOFO_INTERMISSION_010_CUT_0.text:
Have you truly come here for the purpose
of finding triangles? Because I sense very
little energy being devoted to that task.

SUB_W10_WRLD_BOFO_INTERMISSION_010_CUT_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_WRLD_BOFO_INTERMISSION_010_CUT_0.text:
We'd love to find a triangle and leave y'all
in the dust—but as peace officers, we got a
professional obligation to serve those in need.

SUB_W10_WRLD_BOFO_INTERMISSION_010_CUT_0.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W10_WRLD_BOFO_INTERMISSION_010_CUT_0.text:
Wait, THAT'S how you see yourself?
The noble-hero police officer?
Mmm, I'm not so sure about that.

SUB_W10_WRLD_BOFO_INTERMISSION_010_CUT_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_WRLD_BOFO_INTERMISSION_010_CUT_0.text:
This probably ain't the time
to be discussin' this, darlin'.

SUB_W10_WRLD_BOFO_INTERMISSION_010_CUT_0.speaker: Gold_SubManager
SUB_W10_WRLD_BOFO_INTERMISSION_010_CUT_0.text:
Cease your fighting, aliens.
No one wants to see that. Er, wait. No. Actually, I WOULD like to
see two aliens fight. Please continue.

SUB_W10_WRLD_BOFO_INTERMISSION_020_CUT_0.speaker: Gold_SubManager
SUB_W10_WRLD_BOFO_INTERMISSION_020_CUT_0.text:
Perhaps it's time you got serious
about this triangle search of yours.

SUB_W10_WRLD_BOFO_INTERMISSION_020_CUT_0.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W10_WRLD_BOFO_INTERMISSION_020_CUT_0.text:
Agreed—and I feel like we're close.
Would you be willing to help us find it?

SUB_W10_WRLD_BOFO_INTERMISSION_020_CUT_0.speaker: Gold_SubManager

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_RETURN_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_RETURN_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Thanks for all your help, Administrator.
We never would have been able to find
our triangle without you. So I guess this is goodbye?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_RETURN_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Gold_SubManager
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_RETURN_000_CUT_000_010.text:
Wait. If you do not connect to the gate
with great care, you will end up lost
in the Conjoined Worlds. Stay here and I will summon assistance
from the Administrative Division overseer.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_RETURN_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_RETURN_000_CUT_000_020.text:
Nah, we'll be fine. But you ever been out
in the Twilight Area yourself, pardner?
Ever gone through that door?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_RETURN_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Gold_SubManager
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_RETURN_000_CUT_000_030.text:
Members of the Administrative Division
do not leave Delta Base.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_RETURN_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_RETURN_000_CUT_000_040.text:
And it ain't never tempted you none,
the prospect of going outside?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_RETURN_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: Gold_SubManager
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_RETURN_000_CUT_000_060.text:
I have served the same role in the
Administrative Division since the moment
I was born, and will continue to do so
until all my higher functions cease. It took 8,000 cycles before I was promoted and
made an administrator—which is regarded as an
unusually fast ascent—and I have now served
as said administrator for over 5,000 cycles.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_RETURN_000_CUT_000_070.speaker: Gold_SubManager
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_RETURN_000_CUT_000_070.text:
But this 'outside' of yours.
Is it...fun?

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_RETURN_000_CUT_000_080.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_RETURN_000_CUT_000_080.text:
I wouldn't necessarily say that it's 'fun,'
but it is a place where you can choose
to live as you please.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_RETURN_000_CUT_000_090.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_RETURN_000_CUT_000_090.text:
Sounds like someone's hot on our heels.
If you want to come with, pardner,
you'd best shake your spurs.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_RETURN_000_CUT_000_100.speaker: Gold_SubManager
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_RETURN_000_CUT_000_100.text:
Understood. I will accompany
you and see the outside.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_RETURN_010_CUT_000_020.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_RETURN_010_CUT_000_020.text: Oh, we'll be fine. You take care, hon.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_RETURN_010_CUT_000_030.speaker: Gold_SubManager
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_RETURN_010_CUT_000_030.text:
The aliens have departed.
What unusual life-forms.

SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_RETURN_010_CUT_000_040.speaker: Chief_Manager
SUB_W10_EVAR_BOFO_RETURN_010_CUT_000_040.text:
You will now return to your
normal duties, Administrator Gold.

SUB_W10_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_010_CUT_010_03.speaker: Base_Sheriff
SUB_W10_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_010_CUT_010_03.text:
Entry not found in Delta Base registry.
Alien status confirmed.

SUB_W10_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_010_CUT_010_05.speaker: Base_Sheriff
SUB_W10_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_010_CUT_010_05.text:
Aliens must be monitored at all times.
Please follow all applicable rules.

SUB_W10_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_010_CUT_010_06.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W10_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_010_CUT_010_06.text:
Could you maybe tell us
where we are, please?

SUB_W10_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_010_CUT_030_00.speaker: Gold_SubManager
SUB_W10_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_010_CUT_030_00.text:
I am Administrator Gold, your assigned monitor.
I hear you have come in search of 'triangles.'
Can such things truly be found here?

SUB_W10_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_010_CUT_030_01.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W10_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_010_CUT_030_01.text: There's no doubt in my mind.

SUB_W10_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_010_CUT_030_02.speaker: Gold_SubManager
SUB_W10_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_010_CUT_030_02.text:
In that case, I ask that you find
one quickly, for I am very busy. My coworkers are envious of my having been
given the 'easy' role of a monitor, but I fail
to see what is so enviable about it—for when it
is done, I will still have piles of missed work.

SUB_W10_WRLD_BOFO_INTERMISSION_100_CUT_0.speaker: Gold_SubManager
SUB_W10_WRLD_BOFO_INTERMISSION_100_CUT_0.text:
Pssst! You can trust me with your true secret
objective for coming here, aliens. Are you
spies sent from another base? Or saboteurs?

SUB_W10_WRLD_BOFO_INTERMISSION_100_CUT_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W10_WRLD_BOFO_INTERMISSION_100_CUT_0.text:
Y'all must be real starved for entertainment
around here. You know real life is never that
interesting, right?

SUB_W10_WRLD_BOFO_INTERMISSION_100_CUT_0.speaker: Gold_SubManager
SUB_W10_WRLD_BOFO_INTERMISSION_100_CUT_0.text:
Oh? Well, but what about you having been
sent to us by another base? Was I correct
about that part?

SUB_W10_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_020_CUT_020_03.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_020_CUT_020_03.text:
Disposal? Are you nuts!?
That would be a huge waste! Look, I'm sure we can find some use for the aliens.
Maybe they could teach in Yellow Division's Academy
of Foreign Cultures? Oh, or we could use them as
breeding stock for Green Division!

SUB_W10_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_020_CUT_020_04.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_020_CUT_020_04.text:
Yellow Division wants nothing
to do with this.

SUB_W10_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_020_CUT_020_05.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_020_CUT_020_05.text:
First of all, kindly stop referring to our
life-cycle research specimens as 'stock.'
Secondly, we have no plans of using the
aliens in any of our research.

SUB_W10_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_020_CUT_020_06.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_020_CUT_020_06.text:
Seriously? You're gonna let a chance
like this slip through your fingers? Well, if you're really not interested,
I'm sure you won't object if we in
Red Division puts the aliens to good use!

SUB_W10_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_020_CUT_020_07.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_020_CUT_020_07.text:
Listen up, aliens! Until you find your
magic rectangle or whatever it is you're
chasing, you can remain on Delta Base.

SUB_W10_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_020_CUT_020_08.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_020_CUT_020_08.text:
Assign them a caretaker from the
Administrative Division, would you?

SUB_W10_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_020_CUT_020_09.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_020_CUT_020_09.text:
A monitor, you mean? Yes, we'll
ensure they're assigned a monitor.

SUB_W10_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_020_CUT_030_00.speaker: Gold_SubManager
SUB_W10_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_020_CUT_030_00.text:
I am Administrator Gold, and I have been
assigned as your monitor. But as I have no
interest whatsoever in monitoring you,
feel free to do as you please.

SUB_W10_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_020_CUT_030_01.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W10_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_020_CUT_030_01.text:
Are you sure it's okay to
give us that much free reign?

SUB_W10_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_020_CUT_030_02.speaker: Gold_SubManager
SUB_W10_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_020_CUT_030_02.text:
Just don't cause any trouble. If anything
goes wrong, I'm the one who's going to
be chewed out by my bosses.

SUB_W10_WRLD_BOFO_INTERMISSION_200_CUT_0.speaker: Gold_SubManager
SUB_W10_WRLD_BOFO_INTERMISSION_200_CUT_0.text: Good. That's what I like to hear.

SUB_W10_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_030_CUT_010_04.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_030_CUT_010_04.text: I find them to be surprisingly normal.

SUB_W10_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_030_CUT_010_08.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_030_CUT_010_08.text:
I hereby declare today to be Alien
Appreciation Day! Hip hip, huzzah!

SUB_W10_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_030_CUT_010_09.speaker: Gold_SubManager
SUB_W10_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_030_CUT_010_09.text:
All right, that's more than enough of...
whatever this is. The aliens aren't some
amusingly exotic species—they're terribly
dangerous life-forms. For all we know, they're swarming with germs
and pathogens. They may even seek to destroy
us through cultural pollution or weapons
of mass destruction that they smuggled in. But do not worry: the Administrative
Division is on top of the matter.

SUB_W10_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_030_CUT_030_00.speaker: Gold_SubManager
SUB_W10_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_030_CUT_030_00.text:
Greetings. I am Administrator Gold,
and I will be your attendant. ...Attendant to aliens. Wow.
I'm probably never going to
have a duty like this again.

SUB_W10_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_030_CUT_030_01.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W10_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_030_CUT_030_01.text:
I take it outsiders don't visit
Delta Base very often?

SUB_W10_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_030_CUT_030_02.speaker: Gold_SubManager
SUB_W10_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_030_CUT_030_02.text:
It has never happened in all the cycles I
have been here, which makes this all rather
exciting. So welcome to Delta Base, aliens!
